name: Dot Parsons
text: I ordered flowers for my daughter. I called and explained what flower I wanted and gave creative license to him to fill in the rest. I AM SO HAPPY with the outcome. This was my first time using them and will always use them. THANK YOU SO MUCH❤

text: Just wanted to say that Gerald florist knocked it out of the park for my 24th anniversary and having the roses delivered to the Trojan Mexican grill they were fabulous and my wife loved it

name: Laura Thompson
text: My husband surprised me today at Trojan's Mexican Grill with the most stunning red long stem roses, 24 of them for our 24th wedding anniversary! Thank you so much!

name: Felicia Darby
text: Excellent flower shop to find exactly what you need in floral arrangements. If Gerald can't do it. It simply can't be done.

name: mahrie wood
text: Only florist open in Troy until 6pm. Made a small arrangement in 15 minutes with nice service.  Thanks.

name: Princess Creative Productions LLC
text: Thank you Flower Fantasies Florist and Gifts for the beautiful job y'all done on my sister's casket spray. Mrs. Pat Law was easy to work with and delivered the flowers to the funeral home in a timely manner.

name: Emily Holland
text: My brother and I ordered flowers for my grandmother for mother's day. They were scheduled to be delivered on the Saturday before and they were not delivered. We received an email that says they would be delivered by that next Tuesday and we would get 10% back from our purchase. So she was disappointed. THEN when she received them the card said "Happy Valentine's Day"!!!!!!!!!!!!!! We then rechecked our confirmation email to make sure we submitted the correct thing for the card to say and we did. Very disappointed in this flower shop. Used two others for my mother and other grandmothers and their's came on time and written perfectly. Would not recommend.

name: Maysen Matthews
text: Terrible experience. I order flowers for my mom for Mother’s Day and they were supposed to get there the Saturday before. They never showed up, so I called and I was told they had a lot of deliveries and they would be there the next day which was Mother’s Day. Again they don’t show up. I live in Ohio and that’s all I had sent her and she didn’t get anything. Then some lady from the shop called my mom and she was rude and said we could celebrate Mother’s Day any time. They showed up today finally and are not at all what I ordered. I paid $81.99 to get ripped off. Needless to say I will not be using this place ever again. They gave us a $10 off coupon and I can assure you it’s going in the garbage. Use some place else if you don’t want to be disappointed.

name: Josh Noname
text: I ordered a corsage and boutonniere for my senior prom and had it delivered to my school.  Upon delivery I saw that not only was the flower the wrong type, but that I hadn't received my boutinerre at all.  They charged me 35 dollars total, and cannot be reached for a refund after calling for 3 straight days.

name: A G
text: Horrible customer service and low quality flowers. I was expecting a delivery of two dozen roses on a Saturday for an important occasion. Patricia called mid-day Saturday to tell me the driver returned the flowers to the shop and they would have to re-deliver the next day??? She then went on to say the driver was new and she shouldn’t have sent him. The problem is that I was home and had been anticipating the delivery all day long. No one attempted delivery. That was a lie! This caused a major inconvenience. I explained that to Patricia; however, she was unapologetic and her tone was rude. The next day the roses arrived with open petals and many had already wilted. I’ve used many florists and this is by far the worst yet. This place is a joke and should be shutdown.

name: Kylee Alexander
text: WARNING!!!! I will NEVER use this florist again. My flowers were not delivered on the day they were supposed to, we ok'ed another delivery date, they were not delivered on that day and I never received a phone call. They were delivered the next day and were completely different than what I ordered. Communication was horrible, actually non existent (on their part), product was not what I purchased, nor was it delivered on the day it was supposed to.

name: Teneshia Nelson-Hodges
text: I placed an order through FTD for a same day delivery that was for a very special occasion. The order was contracted through Flower Fantasies and was definitely not the arrangement that I ordered through the online site. The arrangement that was received was awful...very unesthetic; not at all the flowers that were pictured in my confirmation; flowers were already wilted. I am extremely disappointed in this company’s customer service; I will make sure I do not transact business with them again in the future.

name: Amanda Odle
text: My 1st complaint was the driver tried to deliver my flowers to the wrong address. The address was clearly written on the envelope when I finally received them.  2nd complaint...I received flowers August 27, 2018  and on Friday August 31, 2018 most of the flowers were dead. The roses never opened. I called and spoke with someone on the phone that was very rude and not a bit concerned at all. She ask that I send her a picture of the flowers so I did that immediately. She has yet to respond to my text. Do not waste your money at this place! I had to rate them a 1 but actually they don't deserve that. BEWARE OF THIS PLACE!!

name: Dianna Lee
text: I have used this company for three years in a row to send my daughter, who is in college in Mobile, a snack basket each year on her birthday.  Each year I have been treated well over the phone, I had no problem placing each order, and my daughter has been delighted every year!

name: Vicki Durst
text: Don't waste your time or money. Patricia Law the owner is extremely rude and unprofessional. This behavior does not stop with her customers. She treats anyone she comes in to contact with in the same manner. She will deliver floral arrangements late, pitiful wilting flowers. Best advice go somewhere else. There are plenty of other honest hard working florist in the area who actually care about their customers. No need to waste your energy and efforts on the trash ones.

name: Karen Mc McMahon
text: I'm sad to see this place has such bad reviews because my experience with them has been amazing. A lovely lady named Patrishia took my order on a SUNDAY over the phone. She was very helpful and patient as I undecided to what to order. I told her my budget and she walked me through everything. The flowers were gorgeous and she even sent me a picture them. I recomend them highly. Thank you again Pat.

name: Eric Hawsey
text: Ordered flowers for my wife for our 2 year anniversary and I selected the florist design and it came out beautiful, it was delivered in time and the delivery lady was very kind and sweet picture was uploaded in the pictures section.

name: gamer nuk
text: My partner ordered a same day bouquet online and this place was chosen to prepare and deliver the arrangement on Tuesday. My girlfriend later received a email stating that the flowers had been delivered. When she reached out to the company the flowers were ordered from they stated that Flower Fantasy stated that they attempted twice to deliver the flowers and that they will try again but this time leave them on the porch. Mind you I was home all day yesterday and today but no-one has knocked on my door, let alone entered my yard. I have a dog who's better than any alarm system and he would have alerted me if so. My address was verified several times, I live on the main street, not a hidden back road. The arrangement was supposed to be a pick me up suprise because Im having a major surgery Thursday. The suprise has become added stress because my girl is out of town and at work so to set her at ease Im calling around trying to locate the arrangement.  Flower Fantasies this is unacceptable.  You have been provided with my number and still I have not heard anything back from you guys. I've even attempted to call only to be directed to  voicemail. I honestly don't even want the flowers now after reading such bad reviews but my Sweets took the time to order them so I will remain thankful for her.

name: Kristin DuPerron
text: We placed a order before noon on Tuesday. We wanted them to be delivered that day, guess what I find out today that they had never been delivered. There customer service is awful, not sure how you run a business this way!W

name: Jody Paar
text: Picture this a mother who is about to give birth and she is so excited! Now picture this that baby is a  still born. Did your heart just break? Ours did in so many ways! I would NEVER do a bad review because I also am a business owner. Rules change when a business just flat out doesn't care and I believe it is time to take action. As a business owner in the fashion world I deal with brides a lot. If my staff makes a mistake and sends out a bride the wrong shoes, I personally will take action to fix it. A wedding is a very crucial time for a woman and if that means I have to come out of my pocket to next day those shoes, I will! if that means I have to go out in the hot warehouse and pull those shoes, I will! I will move heaven and earth so I make sure that bride has a special day! The reason is that day is planned and can't be moved.  Now, you are in the flower business! A mother has a still born baby! A whole family is crushed! You would think that a business owner would also move heaven and earth when a mistake is made. This is another crucial day that can't be changed! This business acted like it was NO BIG DEAL that this banner wasn't made in time for this baby's funeral. It was also said that they couldn't deliver the banner to the funeral side. ARE YOU KIDDING ME??? As a business owner I would of driven it out there myself! I would of been so sincere on the phone, and made the banner myself! I would of called other customers and explained that their flowers may be late due to a heartbreaking situation. I would of hired on extra staff or stayed up all night to make this banner. Each time my friend called the owner was RUDE to her as if she was bothering her! I am sorry but this is so unprofessional on so many levels! To own a business is to own up to mistakes and FIX them ASAP! After many phone calls we finally got a banner and it is TACKY and UGLY and honestly I could of done better myself! Shame Shame on this business owner! If you are going to take on the responsibilities of a business you should always put customer service FIRST! So I would suggest any bride or anyone who may have a special day to think twice before putting your special day plans in this business owners hands. Maybe this owner needs to take some classes on how to run a business professionally. To learn customer service and how to treat people who are sensitive to make their day easier not harder. RIP Emmaleah Rain

name: Janice Files

text:
This place should be closed down for Fraud!

1. They didn't send the correct flowers (Cheaper, wrong color, messy bouquet). 2. They delivered 2 days early (while recipient was out of town for the weekend) which led to my flowers sitting outside in the heat for 2 full days wilting horribly. 3. They did not include the balloons that were paid for. 4. The Happy Birthday Message was scribbled on a "Get Well Soon" card (The original order was placed online). 5. When I called to figure out what had happened I had to call THREE Days in a Row before Pat the Owner could figure out a story to tell me it wasn't their fault.

This was an awful experience all the way around. Don't give these lying thieves your hard earned money.

text:
Such nice people to talk to! I was ordering roses from out of state and Jan was extremely helpful and very kind!! Gave her all the info she needed, since my daughter and husband were picking them up on Friday, June 28th. They called to remind me and they called my husband (since he was in Alabama) to remind him as well that the roses were ready! They were for his Mom's funeral.
Well, since it was pouring rain on Friday June 28th, in Alabama,  they did not have the service.
Reminded my husband to water the roses! Finally, on Tuesday 7/2/19, they had the service and the roses were still fresh and beautiful!! It would not have been the same without the beautiful red and white roses!
Thank you everyone at Leroy's Florist for being so kind and making 2 beautiful rose bouquets that lasted 4 days and still looked vibrant and fresh!
Sincerely greatful,
Nancy T. Linebaugh

name: Frances Dauster CPDT
text:
TERRIBLE What I asked for was a birthday bouquet, no vase, yellow flowers, don't care what kind of flowers, for $40.00.
What I got: a small sprig of flowers, with crushed lilies, roses with dings, the wrapping tissue wasn't even completely put together (had unraveled by the time I got in the car), loose ribbon. and they charged me $44.00.  I asked for a $40.00 item. $40.00 was my budget, not 44.
I was a Winn Dixie around the corner just minutes before and saw flowers there for under $15.00 with better quality but they didn't have something what I wanted, so I went with this florist (I'd been there before with a friend, so I felt I would get something nice).
I never gave this sorry excuse for a $40.00 bouquet to the birthday recipient, I was ashamed to! Normally florists put their stickers on bouquets etc. - there was no such on this thing, and no wonder - I'd be ashamed to pass these out to the public, too! I kept it to show my referring friend this disaster. I took pictures when I got home. My friend was shocked, and she won't be coming back, either.
Why did I pay and walk out of there with this travesty? I have no idea. I was so stunned I was speechless and then went through the paces.

When it came wedding day, our delivery was made three hours too late, the colors didn’t coordinated with what we discussed, arrangements weren’t made as discussed even with pictures that were emailed to them of what I wanted. We were missing boutonnières & my bridal arrangement ended up only being 2 flowers bigger than the bridesmaids ($120 difference ) The excuse was “it’s not our fault you got married on this weekend” word for word in a text I received from them. Very poor customer service & they will not take responsibility for their slip up.

This matter has not been resolved and I have been trying to upload our text conversations but unavailable.

name: Catherine “Catie” Currie
text:
I ordered flowers through a delivery service and they sent an email confirming the delivery, but the recipient had not received them. I called the 3rd party's customer service line and expected to be playing phone tag with a corporate office for days.

I did not expect to get a call from Ronny personally, who did all of the follow up himself and made sure that the delivery was made on his own time and well after his normal business hours. For someone who lives in a completely different state and had no way of following up myself, knowing someone cared this much that his flowers got to their intended destination on time made me feel like I was the most special person in the world.

Every time I have business in Clanton that calls for flowers, I'm not even going to bother with a 3rd party if I can help it. Not when I know this shop is there!

We got home at 3:50 I went to take the trash out, and the stuff I ordered was sitting in the window sill . It was misting rain and the card and everything got wet. I will not be using them again.

name: trm0608
text:
Growing up in Decatur, Simpson’s is one of few well known florists in town. I, along with my parents and even my grandparents, have used them for a number of occasions over the years. We often used them in Student Council at DHS as well. However, I won’t be using them again going fruther.

I currently live in a different city, but I recently called Simpson’s to inquire about having flowers sent to my mother for Mother’s Day and had an encounter with a employee by the name of Anne that left me dissatisfied. While she might have appeared quite polite by her tone, she came across fairly condescending when I asked if they might be delivereing on the day of the holiday this year. I consider it extremely poor customer service to make any customer feel as if their questions are unwarranted, especially if they’re legitimate. Many florists do deliver on Mother’s Day even if they are normally closed on Sunday because it’s a popular holiday for flowers. She even infomred me they themselves did previously deliver the day of Mother’s Day, but no longer do. So it couldn’t have been that absurd of a question.

Previously, I had no particular preference for either Simpson’s or their other main competitor in town, but going forward I will be doing all of my business with their competitor. It’s not only important to sound polite when interacting with customers, but also it’s just as important to connect and be personable when engaging with customers. Evidently, now there seeems to be a disconnect with some of the employees at Simpson’s and their customers.

Thanks for all that you do!

name: Carrol Steakley
text:
I rarely order flowers and I am not happy with the whole teleflora website/florist experience. I feel that I should be able to pick out  a picture of the flowers and container that I would like to purchase, pay for it, and have it delivered. When I order an item, let's say a new chair,  I can see a photo of the  chair and know what I am paying for ,and when it arrives it should be the chair I ordered. I don't like paying for something that is NOT what I ordered. While I understand fresh flowers may need to be substituted the arrangement should resemble the photo. Flowers should be similar and the container should be exact.  A container should not be in a photo on the website if it is not " in stock". This is false advertising. Each individual florist probably doesn't have what is pictured on the Teleflora websites.
I called the florist and expressed my concern and followed up with an email with pictures of what I ordered and what was delivered.  I ordered a beautiful sturdy white wicker basket with flowers and what I got was a cheap multicolored Easter egg basket. They substituted the basket and after I complained they were willing to offer me a credit of $2.50. What a joke!  I will not use this florist in the future for any reason and will never use a site that is managed by Teleflora. My thoughts are that the Teleflora company has way too many florist and they do not know what each flower shop has in stock. So when you order from a site like this one, you NEVER KNOW WHAT YOU ARE GOING TO GET. BEWARE. I wish I could put a photo on this commentary. I paid $45.73 for something that was NOT what I ordered.  Here is the response from the florist:

Thank you for your recent order. We pride ourselves on delivering the best, most fresh and most similar arrangements that we can for our customers and we have been doing so for over 38 year in the Shoals area! I am very glad you were pleased with the flowers that we provided for you and your mother.

In response to your recent request for a 50% refund here is our answer:
The basket chosen was unavailable and a similar value was substitute per our substitution policy.
We were also instructed to call and leave on the front porch if no one was available. Which we did. Our standard policy is to call and if there is no response, and no one is home, we leave a message as to where the flowers are. Since we were instructed, by you, to leave them, they were; only after a phone call was made. Had you not told us to leave the arrangement, and weather was not good for our arrangement, we would have left a message detailing where the arrangement could be picked up.
Also, you did not order from a 3rd party person. You placed your order on our website, which is managed and updated by Teleflora. They are our wire service and website managing team. They have thousands of florists that they service and we all obviously have different items in stock. They do a generic picture, and when a picture is chosen we try to fill the order as best we can with the flowers we have on hand at that particular time. Flowers are very seasonal and have a high turnover because of spoilage. Next time, a  call directly to the florist could save you a substitution since you would know immediately what they had available at that time.

As far as using another florist, they would offer the same substitution policy as us, so I don't know that you would've been happier.

Since you were happy with the flowers provided in the arrangement and they were Pretty and Fresh I can NOT offer you a 1/2 refund of the product, being as though you were please with it. I will however refund you the "basket" charge since you were not pleased with the substitution chosen. I will be adding a refund of the Full container charge of $2.50 to your card. I hope this helps.
Thank you for your business.

It was disappointing and a hassle to figure out what happened. There was no flower upgrade, add on, or partial refund to make up for the huge mistake on their part.

resp.text: Please give us an opportunity to research and respond properly to this situation before leaving a negative review. We value every order and do everything in our power to make sure your order is delivered correct and on time. Without know the specifics of this order I can’t help you resolve the problem. I realize it is too late for her birthday but I still need to determine what happened based on how the order was placed. Please send an email to wecare@jenilynscreations.com with your full name, phone number, the recipient, and the address given so we can address this properly.

name: charles aldridge
text: Great

name: Jack Schlee
text: I ordered flowers twice. Both times they were not what I ordered.

resp.text: We are so sorry you had a problem. We just tried to call you and no answer. We’ll be glad to take whatever corrective measure you would like. Please let us know.

name: A H
text: Thank You Martha Rea’s! My mom loves the  flowers I had delivered for her birthday!!  Will definitely buy from you again!

name: Alisha Myrsa
text: Very helpful people.

name: Helena Bosch
text: I am so thrilled with the service and flowers! I ordered (online) a cake made of flowers the day before! And they were delivered as ordered and looked beautiful. Thank you so much.

name: Jude Saint
text: Timely delivery. My wife loved the roses 🌹.

name: Menita Hyde
text: I called at 4:00 in the afternoon with an urgent request for flowers to be delivered to a funeral home and the service was the next morning. The florist was so kind to work with me to get a basket out that day. She was limited in what she could offer but she took time to let me know my options and put together a lovely basket. The family was very complimentary of how beautiful the basket was. Thank you so much for going above and beyond to offer exceptional customer service.

name: Allan Dunlap
text: The go to for all your floal arrangements.

name: Lydia Nations
text: Flowers were suppose to be delivered by 12pm for my friends birthday, did not arrive till 3:40pm. I called the shop to see if the mistake was from bloomstoday.com or their shop. She said they must have missed the notice of the time. I guess the positive thing is they were honest...the flowers are pretty. :/

name: Charlotte Maise
text: Great job on the pink and white carnations delivered to my granddaughter. She loved them and said that they were the prettiest flowers she had ever seen. I was just sent a recent picture of them and they are still beautiful!

name: Erin Brager
text: I had the best experience ever. I will definitely be returning. The flowers smelled amazing and were delivered promptly. I actually wanted the flowers delivered outside of their delivery hours and the owner personally accommodated my wishes. I received Grade A customer service and I was also notified before and after she delivered them. She was a delight to do business with. I am overjoyed with my entire encounter.

name: Beth Hart
text: Martha Rea’s had been a referral for us out-of-towners so I was not worried about the quality or delivery, but both were right on target. My mother was very pleased with her birthday bouquet! Thank you.

name: varbara VLove
text: Great customer service

name: Amber Mertens
text: I use Martha Rea's often for business and always receive excellent customer service. Then, last week, I was on the recipient side of the delivery. My husband found out about Martha Rea's through an online search (not knowing that I use their services for business) and liked what he saw on their website and gave them a call. I received a beautiful arrangement in a very lovely vase at work the same day he placed the order. It was a wonderful surprise! By the way, the flowers are still beautiful a week later.

name: Shamara Ray
text: I am thrilled with the beautiful arrangement delivered to my daughter on her 25th birthday.  It could not have been more perfect.  The customer service was magnificent.  Such friendly people.

name: T.J. Conwell
text: Thank you for delivering these flowers - however, the balloon that was attached said "Happy Birthday", and I know that I ordered the "I Love You" balloon.  We are not upset, but rather, wanted to ensure you knew that attention to detail was lacking on this order.  For $73, I think that the order should at least be correct.  Thanks.

name: Marina Bowing
text: Such a nice place. Here you can find so many beautiful flowers. Each of them is decorated in a different original way. I was happy to find what I needed and bought a little more than I should, but I don't regret. They were gorgeous!

name: Anthony Raybon
text: I have purchased flowers through them numerous times now, they are always gorgeous and delivered in a timely manner.  I definitely recommend them to others!

name: Arlette Willis
text: My experience is noteworthy, the florists diligently worked to assure a timely arrival of my purchase! The floral arrangement was breathtakingly beautiful and very much appreciated. Thank you for your respectful care and attention to detail. This a florist I will call upon again!

name: Rick Hendrick
text: Thank you for going the extra mile for my delivery! You guys are the best!

name: Vicki Scott
text: This florist is so understanding and kind. She listened to my desires for my Mother's Urn and delivered the most beautiful flowers I've ever seen. She went out of her way to get the arrangement to the funeral home in Wetumpka on time and took great consideration and care to insure they would be beautiful, and they were. I wanted big and beautiful and she did more than that. You wouldn't work with a kinder person who listens and then you let her take it from there. You won't be disappointed and you won't be unhappy with wilting flowers. She a master of her craft. ~Vicki~

name: Teresa Rodden
text:
Nothing better than getting a picture and message saying how our flower arrangement put somebody else’s bouquet to shame.

Job well done!

name: Guardian Adjusters and Appraisers
text: Lovely sympathy floral basket. Thank you.

name: danielle jones
text:
Placed same day order on 8/27 for my mom's 75 birthday. The delivery man called my mom and said that he has been trying to catch up with her all day...lies! And that he could not come back to the house because it was out of his way - unprofessional behavior. My mom knew there was a delivery so she stayed home.

This morning I spoke to my mom who started that the flowers were on their way (around 9:30, 10 am) l, by 12 still no flowers...wow! I called the florist and spoke to I could care less PAM and told her to cancel my order.
Common sense would tell you to deliver flowers that you did not deliver on the previous day, butI guess they're a little slow.
Bottom line...I will never use this florist again, they've ruined my mom's special day. You disgust me...end of story!!!!

name: Uschi K
text: I highly recommend Martha Rea's Florist. This is a business that means to please and this has been the most amazing experience. When recently I had a disappointing delivery, Maria came to my house and substituted with a beautiful and healthy plant. Thank you Maria!

name: Chad White
text: These guys are fantastic.  Delivered my wife a beautiful arrangement with a little teddy bear on our anniversary very quickly.  Thanks again guys!

name: Danielle Davis
text: Terrible customer service!!!! I paid for a birthday bouquet for my mother's 50th birthday. I called to make SURE it would be delivered today. My mother was out of town of town doing mission work on her ACTUAL birthday and I am out of state and could not be there with her.  I spent all day thinking about how delighted she would be to get her surprise gift and They called me 15 minutes before they closed to tell me that they tried to take the flowers but it was too cold and they had no number for her, but they had MY number and didn't say anything until the employees were about to  walk out the door. Whoever was on the phone said they could do it TUESDAY....what in the WORLD. I am out of state and not able to be there for my mother's birthday celebration and the ONLY thing I had for her today is ruined. 1 hour before her birthday dinner she has NOTHING from me.  I am beyond upset. Thanks for ruining the birthday surprise. ....Terrible.

name: Nancy Breland
text:
I just wanted to thank your florist for the beautiful arrangement that you just made for my brother who is at Baptist South. He just got out of surgery after the flowers were delivered and was so delighted at how beautiful they were! He especially loved the lilies!
Thank you for making his sister (me) so thankful that her best wishes were sent to him,
with such beauty❣️
Sincerely,
Nancy Breland
Bainbridge, Georgia

name: Erin Dahlen
text: I have placed online orders at Martha Rea's twice now. I live in North Carolina and am having flowers delivered to my mom in a hospital in Montgomery. The flowers were delivered the same day I ordered them and were beautiful according to mom. Very pleased with the service, even for those of us out of state!

name: Kaylan Maradie
text: Spent 100 dollars, flowers looked absolutely nothing like picture. Don’t waist your money

name: Jean Fader
text: Beautiful flowers. Need to get web orders working properly.

name: Dontae Williams
text:
Placed last minute orders online. Delivered within three hours to my wife!

You guys ROCK!

Thanks for what you do.

name: Kim Lingner
text: I walked in while they were closing and they still took the time to get my order in and I greatly appreciate them in this time of need !!!!

name: Christie Tarantino
text: I ordered flowers from Martha Rea's for my sick mother and her caregiver for Valentine's day.  I received the confirmation and assumed that the order would be delivered as promised.  I found out that the delivery was not made on Friday, and thought that maybe it would be delivered on Saturday due to a backlog.  When they were not delivered on Saturday, I placed a call to the florist this morning and was told that a manager would call me back.  5 hours later, I still have not received a call.  I'm very disappointed by the lack of customer service.  At the least, I could have received some sort of notice that the flowers wouldn't not be delivered on time so that I wouldn't have the expectation that they would be.  But, to add insult to injury, they are now not addressing the problem at all.  If you want to ensure your order would be processed, I would not order from Martha Rea's.

name: Jennifer Comer
text: I was ordering from out of state and they took careful thought on my requests in the notes portion of the online ordering process.  The arrangement exceeded my expectation in quality, size, and beauty. Thank you, Martha Rea's, for your talent and consideration. I look forward to using your services in the future.

name: Clay Dudley
text: I placed an order over the phone on a Wednesday to send flowers to an office that had an employee pass away. I requested the flowers to be delivered on Thursday AM. I called the office/client and came to find out that they never received the flowers. I spoke with someone on Friday morning and they apologized for not getting them out and explained that they did not file the order, but they did charge my account. I understood that mistakes happened, but requested that the flowers be delivered promptly that morning. I found out that they were not delivered until close to 4PM that Friday... after most of the office had gone home for the weekend. Mistakes happen, but if you cannot correct them and honor your word, then you clearly do not care about your customers. Needless to say, I will not be using Martha Rea's again.

name: joan williams
text: Having been a patron while at home in Montgomery; being overseas in Doha,Qatar your online services allows me to deliver love across the oceans. Thank you MarthaRea's

name: Martha White
text: The flowers I've received from Martha Rea's have been of the highest quality.  The flowers are fresh, beautiful, and creatively arranged.

name: Simona Yelder
text: Thank you so much for all your help Ms.Maurean.I hope I'm saying  your name right. You was so helpful, I really appreciate all you did.

name: Adrian Hopkins
text:
Ordered through Teleflora same day. Arrangement was poorly put together.

Rose buds weren't matched well(some closed, some half open, some full bloom)

Leaves weren't trimmed well. Hopefully they bloom nicely

name: Brian Wren
text: HORRIBLE. Ordered 14 roses to come with spray roses and 3 balloons. What did my wife receive? 7 roses with spray roses and no balloons. Attempted to get it corrected and they were the rudest people we have ever dealt with. tried to make my wife believe i was lying about what i ordered. (i have receipts obviously) and even told my wife to be thankful she got anything on valentines day because she (the owner) had no one to give her anything for valentines day. Well if this is the way she treats customers i can only imagine how she treats people who arent supporting her business. i guess we see why she has noone. Flower situation was never corrected although she did get the balloons but not before they had my wife in tears with their rudeness.

name: Glenda Russell
text: Arrangements from Martha Rae's are ALWAYS beautiful.  If I'm sending or receiving I have never been disappointed.

name: Kathy Jackson
text: had flowers sent to my mother in montgomery and they were beautiful she loved them and the whole house was talking about these flowers for months .. great job

name: Let's talk with Jd & Me Me D
text: I've been ordering from out of state for the last 2 years and my recipient is always, always satisfied with her arrangements.. Thank youuuuuuuuuu!!!

name: Lauren Phelps
text: I order flowers from out of town and they couldn't have been more helpful!  They took the time to contact me and make the necessary arrangements for flowers going to a near by funeral home.

name: James Files
text: Thanks SO much.  Lynn loved the arrangement!

name: John Alexander
text: I've never been to the florist in person but have used them many times to send flowers to my daughter in Alabama. We have always been very satisfied.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Alexander we appreciate you and Mrs. Alexander tremendously!! We know how important it can be to a parent to celebrate a child's birthday and we are delighted you choose Martha Rea's for your floral needs! Thank you again and looking forward to continue the tradition!!

name: Joshua Simmons
text: Delivered on time and beautiful! My Gf absolutely adored them!

name: Daphne Johnson
text: Great customer service although I gave the wrong delivery address. Thank you very much.

name: Eric Isaacson
text: Whenever I need to impress someone I always immediately go to Jane and her talented crew. She has helped me out from dates to thank you gifts and even my moms birthday. Being an entreprenuer in the service industry I rarley run into places that meet my high standards for service, but this place met and exceeded! I highly recommend them for any of their sevices! Have used them and will continue to use them!!

name: Jenny Kim
text: It's very unkind. I will never go back.

name: Jay Villagomez
text: The corsage she did for my daughter was amazing!!! Honestly dont think i paid enough for it!!! Thank you guys so much!!

name: Josh Bryan
text: Ordered an arrangement for out of state for my mother who lives in Montgomery. The arrangement arrived as promised and was beautiful!

name: Troy Gerren
text: This is the most unprofessional florist I have ever come across. I ordered a white standing spray for a funeral. I paid  $95 for this arrangement and received 5 flowers in it. Tried to talk to the florist and they actually tried to suggest that the funeral home took the roses out that was not even advertised in the arrangement.When mentioned that the website says 100% guaranteed and was told the website does not state that. Then she had an attitude when talking to me.

resp.text:
We have gone through all of our past sales receipts for the past two weeks, and we are unable to find a receipt associated with your name. It seems that your purchase may have been done through a different service other than marthareasflorist.com.
Here at Martha Rea's we proudly support our local funeral homes and other business and we are sorry to hear that another company misinformed you about our affiliation. Best of luck getting in contact with that service to resolve this matter.

For future floral references please feel free to contact us directly, 334-262-1991 or visit our friendly website at http://www.marthareasflorist.com/ so we can handle your floral needs directly.

Best Wishes,
Martha's Rea's Floral Team

name: Robbie Amunds
text: Ordered same day delivery online at 9AM this morning. Never received it. Called the store 5 times throughout the day and left two voicemails and never got a call back. Hopefully I will get them tomorrow. Very disappointed.

name: Darius Holley
text: Always Wonderful! I will not use anyone else EVER!

name: Kim Namjoon's Sweetheart
text: Beautiful arrangements, great customer service.

name: Michael Davis
text: Awesome. Martha Rea's sure made a beautiful arrangement for my precious girlfriend. Thanks a million.

name: Trish P.
text: They were so helpful & kind. I really appreciate them!!!!

name: William Stone
text: 32 years together and the flowers made it special. great job!!!!

name: Kevin Temple
text: Very nice flowers!

name: leonard gordon
text: Great florist and outstanding service

name: Mary Lynne Wright
text: Wonderful customer service! Thanks!

name: Austin Cook
text: Terrible customer service, and a terrible attitude. I cancelled my order so I can't speak on the flowers.

name: Vermon Tate
text: Terrible customer service. Shop somewhere else.

name: jennifer wilkerson
text: Very dependable and good prices

name: Doing Whatsright
text: Horrible

name: Sharon Grubbs
text: My friend from out of state contacted 333 Designs/Unforgettable Flowers to send me a specific kind of flower arrangement.  She was treated with such care and consideration!!! They went out of their way to send the perfect arrangement!  I was not familiar with them but will definitely recommend and use in the future. The arrangement is breathtaking❤️

name: Edward Melendez
text: A fantastic place to plan your next event from something small like a birthday to a corporate anniversary. They can take care of everything from your venue to photographer.

resp.text:
Dear Edward,
Thank you for your review. We loved that you used our services and that you recommend us.  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review, we know your time is valuable!
Wishing you the best,
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Vickie Gesellschap
text: Corrie came through again!! On relatively short notice, she hit a home run for me with the delivery of 3 beautiful arrangements for a wedding shower I hosted. Her creativity in design showed through. Everyone commented on how beautiful the flowers were! Thanks, Corrie.

name: Kayla Schmaeling
text: In an absolute time crunch, and a last minute planned wedding, Corrie and 333 Designs swooped in and completely saved the day. While planning a quick, immediate family wedding in Charleston, Sc, Corrie was more than willing and happy to help anyway she could! She was able to create the most stunning bridal bouquet and boutonnière on a last minute request. She took my ideas and vision and made it even more beautiful than I had hoped! She packed everything up and hand delivered the arrangements the day we were set to leave - please note, she did this in about ZERO time and absolutely blew us away! The flower are now about a week and a half old and the bridal bouquet, set in water, is still holding strong! I can’t say enough about Corrie and 333 Designs - I highly recommend them!

name: Amy Mayfield
text: Corrie and her whole team worked to make our event look the best it's ever looked. We got rave reviews from our attendees and she went out of her way to ensure everything looked amazing!

name: Genevieve Vigil
text: Excellent customer service. We used 333 for our wedding, and my fiance and I were so busy in the weeks before the wedding we never really had time to meet with Corrie. But she was very accommodating and made time for us to call and email to get every detail arranged. Very good service. I can't wait to see her creations!

resp.text:
Dear Genevieve,
I loved designing your flowers and helping you with your wedding. It's my job to work around your busy schedule and help bring together all the details. You both were a pleasure to work with, and I loved seeing your photos!

Wishing you both the best!
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Jareen Alam
text: From day one, Corrie Spearing of 333 Designs has helped both my husband and I to plan our wedding reception in Huntsville, Alabama. She is THE master planner and we are so thankful to have her by our side the entire time. Corrie was very easy to work with; she knew exactly what we had envisioned within our first meeting. This made things much simpler and smooth on our planning end. The moment we walked into our reception hall, both of us were in complete shock of how beautiful things were. My husband and I did absolutely nothing at our wedding reception, other than to enjoy the moment and actually get the chance to mingle with our friends and family. We even got to enjoy our dinner with family, and have cake! We are so grateful for that and will forever cherish these moments! Corrie did a fantastic job, and took this event under her arms as a true professional that she is in this line of career. She was easy to work with, talented, quick to reply, queen of multitasking, and just super awesome! Thank so much for everything! If ever again in the future we need a planner, we are coming right back to you!

resp.text:
Jareen,

What a joy to be a part of your special day! Thank you for taking the time to reply and leave us a review. We know your time is valuable and it means the world to us that you were pleased and let us know!

Sincerly,
Corrie and the 333 Designs team

name: Katie Chandler
text: We recently used 333 Designs for our wedding and were extremely disappointed with our experience. In meetings they seemed to understand exactly what was wanted, given exact pictures for some decorations and told things that the bride did not want to see anywhere. The day of my wedding I walked in to one of my locations and everything was the opposite of what I asked for. We did not receive what we feel we paid for at all and believe there was some time mismanagement which led to many things not being done properly. After the wedding we were billed an additional charge even though we had paid in full what the contract had said before our wedding. We will never choose to work with or recommend 333 designs again.

resp.text:
Dear Katie,
We are saddened by your review and to hear that after all that we did we were unable to make you happy.
We do our best to manage expectations, by design boards, detailed notes, as well as written out details in the final invoices. We understood your dreams and to be fair the final weeks leading to your big day your parents, and yourself, agreed to keep things in a more reasonable budget and made some changes. We had those changes clearly noted and approved before even ordering the flowers. Everyone saw the “Pinterest” style wedding and commented on how kind we were and how we went above and beyond what we were even contracted to do. The compliments from your family and friends and the many apologies for how we were treated by you were a testimony that we handled the wedding professionally and everything was beautiful. We hope that you can look back one day and see all the love and sacrifice everyone did to help make your wedding day come together and look so breathtaking.

Wishing you all the best and a wonderful marriage,
Corrie and the 333 Team
To see images from the wedding please click here: https://333designs.com/portfolio/katie-and-reed/

name: Madeline Creekmore
text: Corrie was fantastic to work with!  I would highly recommend her to ANYONE looking for a wedding or event coordinator.  She did day-of planning for me for my wedding a few weeks ago, and I couldn't have been happier with our decision to higher her.  When I first started planning my wedding, I did not think it was worth the money to higher a coordinator.  But as plans started to get more and more complex, I quickly realized that I was in over my head.  There were so many details to attend to on the day of the wedding, and I knew that I would not be in the right frame of mind to handle them myself.  Corrie listened to all of my ideas and executed them better than I could have myself.  Everything about my wedding day ran flawlessly because of her efforts, and my family and I were much more at ease and able to relax and enjoy the day knowing that Corrie had it under control.  My only regret from my wedding planning process was that I didn't hire her sooner to help me plan the whole thing! If you are looking for a fun and professional wedding coordinator, look no further, Corrie is your gal!   Oh... and did I tell you she did my hair???  She Did My Hair!  And it was GORGEOUS!

resp.text:
Madeline,
Looking back and reading reviews like this makes me so happy! I loved helping and taking stress off of everyones plate. Thank you for leaving such a wonderful review. We strive to help and provide a service like no one else! Glad I could help you with your hair too! It means so much to know that I was able to help you out during your special day!

Blessings,
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Kelsey Greene
text: Corrie and the staff at 333 Designs were awesome!! They provided the flowers for our wedding and to say they were a hit would be an understatement. They were timely, professional, and a pleasure to work with. I would definitely recommend 333 Designs to any and everyone looking for a creative and fabulous florist!

resp.text:
Thanks for these kind words! Kelsey you were a joy to work with and we are so happy you were so pleased! Thank you for letting us be a part of your special day, and it's great to hear the flowers were a hit! Wishing you all the best.

-Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Wedding Chapel
text: Corrie and the entire team at 333 Designs are amazing to work with. Her floral arrangements are beyond gorgeous and her attention to detail is exceptional. As an owner of a business, it's great to work with people you can count on in putting together weddings and special events.

resp.text:
We love working with you guys! Always love providing flowers for you and your wonderful brides! Can't wait for our next event together.
xoxo,
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: mom anderson
text: I can not disagree more with the last post. Cory took lots of time to make sure she know what my daughter wanted for her wedding. She was on time and the flowers were exactly  what my daughter wanted. She even was able to do a late change of plans for us. The flowers were fresh and lasted long after the wedding. She also helped my daughter with other details about the wedding- not just the flowers. Would use her shop again!

resp.text:
We love you! So thankful for the kind response. I wish everyone was has happy as you! We strive to help and serve but sadly we cannot take care of everyone expectations. I am so glad we were able to provide you guys with such great service and that you were so pleased! Can't wait to work with you again on any event you should need us for!

Sincerely,
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Jamie Lucas
text: 333 Designs and their staff are hard working and professional! They did the flowers and set up for my wedding. My flowers were absolutely beautiful and it was a dream come true! Whether you need a full on planner or just a few simple flower arrangements, give Corrie and her team a call today!

resp.text:
Jamie,

This means a lot to me and my team! We loved being a part of your wedding! Thank you for the opportunity and for the kind review!

Best of wishes for your marriage and a happy life together!

Sincerely,
Corrie Spearing

name: Dave Robertson
text: AMAZING!!!! The flowers took my breath away at my daughters wedding.  I could not have asked for anything better.  I would highly recommend 333 Designs!  Dena Robertson

resp.text:
We are so excited to read this review! It makes us to glad to know that you loved everything so much. Thank you for taking the time to review and for allowing us to be a part of yours and your daughter's special day.

Sincerely,
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Sean Sigh
text: 333 Design's brand is beautiful! They always take my vision to the next level. They allows me to be creative and steps in when I draw a blank. They remove stress and manage my expectations in a efficient and respectful manner. And everytime I visit thier amazing office space, I feel inspired. Can't wait for our next event!

resp.text:
Dear Sean,
Your review blesses us! We strive to go above and beyond and bring visions to life! It means so much that we were and are able to do that for you!
Wishing you the best, and look forward to our next event as well!
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Chase Renegar
text: Absolutely fabulous to work with! Corrie is on-top of things. She keeps her brides very calm and relaxed through the wedding process, and is organized. It was been a pleasure working with her! We look forward to it more in the future =)

resp.text:
Chase,

Thank you so much for the review! Always a pleasure working with you!

Looking forward to more amazing events!
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Rocco de Gregory
text: When my fiancée, now my wife, said she wanted to have a day-of wedding coordinator, I thought it would be a waste of money.  I COULD NOT HAVE BEEN MORE WRONG! Having Corrie and the rest of the 333 Design team working with us made the days leading up to our wedding much easier.  I can’t even imagine how stressful the actual wedding day would have been without Corrie.  She gave me a Groom’s timeline, and all I had to do was to be at the indicated location at the correct time.  333 coordinated with all of our vendors, set up and broke down our entire reception, and handled any issues that came up before and during our event.  I cannot stress how much you need Corrie and her team - worth every penny!!

resp.text: Thanks for supporting what we do, Rocco. We love that we could help make your wedding be as easy as possible -- it's all about enjoying the day with your beautiful bride! We appreciate the kind words and hope the married life is treating you well. -Kind regards, The Team at 333 Designs

name: Nancy Finnegan
text: 333 Design is an event planner I often work with. Her talent and professionalism is outstanding! I can easily say the brides I have done makeup for have been more at ease on their wedding day because of her!

resp.text:
Nancy,
Love working with you! You are a talented makeup artist and my brides are blessed to have your help! Cant wait for more amazing weddings together!
xoxo,
Corrie

name: TaCara Harris
text: Poor communication, extremely unprofessional, and unacceptable customer service. A detailed review of my cousin's wedding contract reveals that multiple provisions were breached by 333 Designs without explanation or remorse, and she was left having to find replacement planners right before her wedding. If 0 stars were an option, it would be warranted in this case. Beware!

resp.text:
Dear TaCara,

We are so sorry your cousin was unhappy. We also value your family loyalty. We would be happy to meet with you cousin to discuss the contract further if she feels something was not completed as agreed.  We always strive to accommodate and we love to make people happy when we can!

Sincerely
333 Designs

name: CORANDA AND CHARLES WIMS
text: If the bride wants a stress free coordinator, I would not recommend using 333 designs. Corrie made the entire planning process stressful for both the bride and groom then insinuated on several occasions they were broke. It was absolutely disgusting and she was fired 2 weeks before the wedding because of her unprofessionalism.

resp.text: We want to assure you our team is happy to work with brides and grooms with any budget, Coranda, and we apologize if we gave off any other impression -- that was not our intent. It sounds like there was some definite miscommunication, and if you reach out to us privately, we'd love to answer any questions. Wishing you all the best. Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Cassie Shropshire
text: If the bride wants a stress free coordinator, I would not recommend using 333 designs. Corrie made the entire planning process stressful for both the bride and groom then insinuated on several occasions they were broke. It was absolutely disgusting and she was fired 2 weeks before the wedding because of her unprofessionalism.

resp.text:
This and the several reviews before and to follow are very sad. We have such a desire to serve and provide a service, however, we simply cannot provide services that our outside of our physical ability or contract.

This is one of the reasons we have contracts. -We provided everything in and according to contract, but the client had expectations and requirements that were far outside of our agreement, and they refused to pay more for the services they requested. Two weeks before when they still were requiring us to do more than we could, we felt it was best to walk away. We agreed to credit the couple back some of the money (even though we were not required to do so) and they could use the money how they felt they should. We also agreed that there would be no slander or malice on either side because we came to an agreement, and each party walked away content with these terms. If you would like more information in regards to this please let us know. If you are reading this know that we cannot  provide free services or labor,  and this couple was asking of us.

name: Sarah Melendez
text: Their team is amazing! They make everything so easy! We love you guys!

resp.text:
Sarah,

That's what we love to hear! We love helping making dreams come true and hope to make life so much easier!

Glad you are so pleased!!
Corrie (planner with 333 Designs)

name: Tammy Therriault
text: I'm so happy to be acquainted with 333 Designs.  Very professional and gets the job done right.  If there is a problem, she handles it very professionally and gets it corrected.

resp.text: Tammy, it's a pleasure working with you, and I'm glad you've been happy with our services. We're here if you need us! Kind regards, 333 Designs

name: Erin Lindsey
text: I absolutely LOVED working with Corrie and Jessica from 333 Designs at the wedding we photographed this past weekend!! Not only was the wedding absolutely breathtaking and perfect, but Corrie and Jessica were friendly, helpful, knowledgable, and professional from start to finish. I highly recommend 333 Designs to every bride!

resp.text:
Erin,
You are an amazing photographer and a blessing to work with! Thank you for your referrals and kind review!

Xoxo,
Corrie, Jessica and the 333 Team

name: Jane G.
text: I hired 333 Designs for both wedding coordinating and floral design 15 months prior to my daughter’s wedding day based upon recommendations and visits to two of her decorated venues.  During our first planning session Corrie used her computer to show both pricing options as well as flower and decoration ideas.  Her prices were favorable and she offered cost cutting suggestions.  We met many times throughout the 15 months prior to the wedding and tweeked the plans as needed.  The rehearsal was expertly directed by Corrie’s assistant Lauren giving me confidence in the ceremony.  Corrie and Lauren worked together during the ceremony and reception to ensure smooth transistions.  I was able to enjoy one of the happiest days of our lives without worry.  I highly recommend Corrie and 333 Designs.

resp.text:
We're thrilled to have been a part of one of the happiest days of your life!

Thanks for taking the time to share this with us. It was a pleasure working with you, and your daughter! Blessings on you all and their marriage!

-Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Bikhari Reyes
text: Corrie Spearing and her team at 333 designs are the greatest event planners that anybody could ask for. I have worked with Corrie and her team on multiple occasions, and they were very crisp, clean, punctual and thorough with their work. They have made wedding days for many different couples the best days of their life. She has yet to as much as mess up with a wedding. My employer at Cakes By Scelle Rey, LLC recommends 333 Designs to all of her clients, and I would too. YOU ROCK CORRIE!!!!

resp.text: You rock! Thanks for sharing this -- your support is appreciated. It's always a please working with you guys, and we hope to create more beautiful events in the future! Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Brighton Pollard
text: Corrie is not only a wonderful florist but an amazing person. She's such a kind, ambitious, and driven person and truly a pleasure to work with! I would have loved for her to be my planner but she was already booked as a planner for the day so BOOK THIS VENDOR IN ADVANCE!! For my wedding, I didn't really want a lot of flowers but just a TON of greenery and Corrie nailed it with just a few springs of lavender and thistle (which was such a unique feature) and then a few peonies and ranunculus for my bouquets and cake. The arbor was so beautiful it became kind of like a photo booth backdrop where all my guests took pictures through out the night. She set up draping and lights when I decided last minute and responded to my way too many emails in a prompt manner. I'm kind of a control freak =/ She even made last minute changes to the bridesmaids floral crowns to ensure I was happy the day of. I've highly recommended Corrie and 333 Designs to several of my friends and would to anyone who asked.

resp.text:
Brighton,

I have loved getting to know you and so glad we could continue after the wedding as friends. I love your photos and I am so glad you choose to work with us! Thank you for such a great review!

Sincerely,
Corrie and the 333 team

name: Nathanael Zurinsky
text: Corrie Spearing is the absolute worst wedding planner and florist.  She has no organizational skills and does not pay attention to details.  I have a complaint in with the better business bureau asking for a refund and she has not even attempted to apologize for ruining my wedding day.  I have documented evidence from receipts, to Corrie's own contract, to the wedding pictures, and wistness testimony stating all the things that she messed up at our wedding.  I have a total of over 31 documented items that she messed up on.  It was pointless to have Corrie for our wedding planner when we could have done all the work ourselves and saved almost $3K that we spent to not have to worry about all the things that she messed up.  For further information, please see a detailed list of items that were filed with the BBB that list out all the things that she messed up.  I would not recommend her to anyone!

resp.text:
Nathanael,

You're wedding day was beautiful and I am sad that you felt it was ruined. The photos turned out amazing and everyone said it was wonderful. We know that we went above and beyond, and we helped provide services that were not event listed in our contracts. We always strive to please and meet expectations, we are deeply saddened by your response. Blessings on your and your wife Mary. I hope you guys can one day see how magical the day was and appreciate the hours of work we provided for you at such an incredible rate.

Sincerely,
333 Designs

name: Brandi Furr
text: My mother always said if you don't have anything good to say, then don't say anything at all.

resp.text:
We are so sorry that you feel this way. As planners, we represent the client and we have to stand up for them even if it could hurt feelings.  You were hired to do a specific job, and as we appreciate your willingness to help, you did not provide the services that the client requested nor what we had discussed days before the event. If you were unable to provide the items you agreed to provide and would have let us know things could have gone more smoothly and my team and the catering staff would not have had to help you out so much. My client does not wish to pay more for services that they felt were done inadequately. We wish you all the best with your business and future endevours.

-Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Jimi Griffin
text: Great place for flowers I found what I needed in no time

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback, Jimi!

name: matthew thomason
text: Norton’s always does a great job... best place to get flowers and arrangements in B’ham.

name: Justin Flowers
text: I love this company. I've never had anything but quality service with great looking flowers.  A friend of mine told me about them a few years back and they still do a great job today. This is my go-to flower shop for delivery!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback, Justin! We’ve been trying to do a great job since 1921!

name: Tint Pro
text: They did a great job on the flowers for our anniversary. On time and they looked great.

resp.text: Thank you! Happy belated anniversary!

name: Tammy Willis
text: What an awesome company.  I received one of their bouquets as a gift from my son who lives in Huntsville.  When I visited him this past June, I wanted to go to their store and arrange another bouquet for my home and have it shipped.  They were so friendly, helpful and talented in helping me arrange the perfect bouquet and having it shipped to my home in California.  Upon my return home, I received my package and unfortunately, the Post Office was a little rough with my package and damaged some of the flowers.  Anthony at Paper Petals assured me they would take care of me and that they did!  They replaced the damaged flowers in a very timely manner with great communication throughout the process.  Awesome customer service and I will not hesitate to use them again.  Their flowers are incredible, life like and beautiful.  Best part, I don't have to water or worry about dying.  Thank you!

resp.text: Hi Tammy, we're so glad you had a good experience with us (and that your replacement bouquet arrived safely!) It was great having you visit our studio and we really enjoyed arranging your bouquet together for you!

name: G Dunn
text: Beautiful flowers in store. I took a class to make cherry blossoms. Thao was a great teacher and very patient with us all. Everyone made beautiful flowers! LOVE

resp.text: Thank you for attending the class! It was so fun working with everyone. And we agree, everyone's flowers turned out lovely!

name: Mary Hinson
text: I went to Paper Petals Co at Lowe Mill and picked up and Zinnia Kit along with a cute vase! The kit came with all the materials needed and a code to the video tutorial. All you need are a pair of scissors! My family had such a fun time making these flowers and we were so happy with how they all came out!

resp.text: The flower you created looks gorgeous, Mary! Thank you to you and your family for giving our Craft Box a try!

name: Anastacia LaRocco
text: I don't even know where to begin when it comes to singing their praise. They are amazing when it comes to communication and they go above and beyond for their customers. I left a resin flower in their care that my father had made before he passed and I have been so nervous but they treated it with great care. Because of them my dad still gets to walk me down the aisle and I couldn't ask for more. They more than delivered on my wedding flowers and I'm so grateful they will forever be a part of my special day. Thank you so SO much!

resp.text: Staci, we absolutely loved working with you and your family! And seeing everyone's reaction to all of our flowers, especially the incorporation of your father's resin flower, made the occasion even more special. Thank you for choosing us to create such a sentimental piece for your special day!

name: Ashleigh Streeter
text:
I have followed Paper Petals Co. on social media for a couple of years now and have always wanted to order because their work is just so beautiful. I finally ordered two different items for Mother’s Day and WOW they did not disappoint! Absolutely stunning and detailed work! I am so happy with both bouquets. 10/10 Recommend!!

Also, the packing for the shipping was perfect and so well done! No concern about damage at all!

Everything I expected and more!!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers for Mother's Day, Ashleigh! We're happy that you're happy with our flowers! We hope you and your loved ones will enjoy those flowers for years to come.

name: Bridget Brooke
text: We are in love with Thao's amazing work! My husband surprised me for our anniversary with a paper version of my flower crown from our wedding, and with the most adorable cherry blossoms for my birthday. We also sent a Mother's day bouquet that was absolutely gorgeous. I cannot say enough good things, and now want to fill my entire house with these gorgeous creations!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Bridget! We loved recreating your flower crown and the rest of your florals so we're so happy to hear they were well received!

name: Delilah Steen
text: I love the craft boxes. The single stem and bouquets are also really great for presents. Shipping is fast and beautifully packaged.

resp.text: We're always overjoyed to hear love for our Craft Boxes! Thank you, Delilah!

name: Shalin Mody
text: They have the most wonderfully crafted paper flower bouquets 🤩🌺😍! I've received compliment after complement for the paper flowers I've sent friends and loved ones.  Even better is the story behind the business.  We're very fortunate to have them in Huntsville 😁

resp.text: Thank you for your appreciation for our flowers, Shalin!! It was really a pleasure to chat with you when you stopped by the studio!

name: Ashim Shrestha
text: Absolutely beautiful flowers, with top-notch craftsmanship! Brilliant choices, and selections to chose from. I used them for my niece's birthday party theme, and she loved it so much that she ended up using them in her room. Thao was so easy to work with and made sure she knew exactly what I wanted. Couldn’t be happier, highly recommend!!

resp.text: This really means a lot that she continued to use them in her room after the party! Thank you for letting us be a part of her special day!

name: conbuom
text: This place is everything! The craftsmanship, attention to detail, it’s all gorgeous. And all of the interactions with them were super professional and friendly. Plus the owners have built this business organically - from the ground up! Which is another reason I love to support them. Highly recommend.

resp.text: We are so happy reading your review conbuom, thank you so much for your praise! We feel blessed to have your support, so thank you for following along with us on our paper flower journey!

name: Mika Middleton
text: all around amazing work and excellent customer care. I will be purchasing from them again and again.

resp.text: Thank you, Mika! We always look forward to when you stop by the studio!

name: M Dohr
text:
Coolest bouquet I’ve ever bought for  my gal.

She loved it and it will last .. timeless

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers!!

name: Mariah Johnson
text: We used Paper Petals for our wedding flowers. They were beautiful and we got so many compliments. They looked real!! The best part is we still have them for memories and decorations in our home. Thao was wonderful to work with. She listened to my vision and made it come to life. I would nightly recommend her flowers to anyone for any occasion! Well worth the money.

resp.text: Mariah, it was such a pleasure working with you to create your bridal bouquet!! For our flowers to be a part of your special day and knowing that they are still brightening up your home, that makes our day. Thank you so much for trusting us with your wedding flowers!

name: Jacklyn Parham
text: Excellent teacher beautiful flowers

resp.text: Thank you, Jacklyn!! We're glad you were able to join us for the classes!

name: Janet Elledge-Nauman
text: I purchased a bouquet for my niece.  When they arrived she said they were really beautiful and she was glad that they were made by a local artisan!

resp.text: Thank you for supporting us local artists!!

name: Ishan B
text: Great selections of flowers at their location in Huntsville. Can be scented as well. Better to gift these flowers as they won't decay and  thrown out after few days and can always be nice decor anywhere you put them. I recommend 5/5.

resp.text: Thank you for stopping by our studio. We're so glad to hear that you appreciate our forever flowers!

name: Kathleen N
text: During this strange chaotic time, I was looking for something to spark a sense of joy. I started in my venture of wanting to grow flowers/plants, but knowing I have a black thumb. As a result, I started looking into paper flowers. Instagram recommended Paper Petals Co. after some search, and I began reading up on the company’s mission statement. I will be honest and say, I also have a very soft spot for Asian women entrepreneurs who are thriving in their businesses. I am so excited to eventually get many more flowers, but I did send a bouquet to a friend and can’t wait to see my friend’s reaction. With that said, I am incredibly impressed by Thao’s talent, her passion for her work, and her kindness as a human. It’s been such a pleasure conversing with her, and I plan to continue supporting this business that brings so much happiness.

resp.text: Reading your words of kindness and encouragement have truly made our days, Kathleen! Thank you so much for all of the support you've given us and we cannot wait for you to one day visit our studio!

name: melissa nguyen
text: ppc is a really wholesome company. They’ve been so passionate about their work ever since the beginning and it shows. Their flowers are stunning and its totally worth a look !

resp.text: If our passion is visible through our work then we've succeeded! Thank you, Melissa!

name: Mariah Zielke
text: Thao’s flowers are so beautiful! The perfect dainty addition to my home.

resp.text: Thank you, Mariah!! We're happy that our flowers can be decorating your home!

name: Emaley Thomas
text:
I'd met the owner of this shop at an event & fell in love with her work. When I was walking through Lowe Mill one day I saw that she had opened up shop recently via her social media and I will forever be buying flowers from her.
The quality of work is unlike anything I've seen in paper flowers. You can tell not only by talking to her but by her attention to detail she is doing what she loves. The flowers are vibran, well-constructed,  and one of a kind. Will always come back to buy more.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your compliments, Emaley!! It is so good to hear that the little details are not going unnoticed, so thank you for your love for our flowers!

name: jean beasley
text: I’ve taken a couple of workshops from Thao (the owner). She is a great teacher! I enjoyed the workshop so much, I bought crepe paper, wire and pan pastels to make my own. (I’ve now taught my mom how to make crepe paper flowers.) I’ve also bought quite a few flowers from Thao to decorate my home. I love her flowers!

resp.text: Jean, it's always a pleasure anytime you stop by and we have a chance to work together! Thank you for spreading the love for paper flowers!

name: Priscillia Engelking
text: Beautiful handcrafted bouquets with colors even brighter than the pictures! The customer service and timely shipping is also great. I have purchased multiple bouquets for my house as well as gifts.

resp.text: It's been a joy putting together bouquets for you! Thank you for your support, Priscillia!

name: Brianna Haynes
text: I have purchased flowers multiple times and recently attended a workshop to create my own paper flower.  Thao's flowers are absolutely stunning. At times I have even forgotten that they aren't real.  The workshop was fun and informative.  The instruction was clear and easy to follow and the materials are excellent quality.  I will be attending more workshops in the future.

resp.text: It is a pleasure every time you visit the studio, Brianna! Thank you for all of your support!

name: Sunny Lloyd
text:
I found out that Paper Petals sells craft boxes and decided that I needed one ASAP before I ended up with cabin fever and a dead husband (I kid!)

I placed my order on Saturday and it was delivered Sunday. I cried, it’s honestly that exquisite, and such a welcome distraction from all that’s going on in our world today. I don’t have a creative bone in my body, but it’s been a lovely activity. Thank you so much, Thao!!

resp.text: Sunny, you are too sweet!! It really means a lot that my Craft Box could bring you such a good experience during this crazy time. Thank you so much!

name: Valerie DePalma
text: Their flowers are gorgeous and they have lots of different options to make bouquets or to purchase ones already made. If you don't live in Huntsville you can have them shipped as well and they'll come in perfect condition!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers, Valerie! We always try to have many different options for everyone to match any occasion, so we're glad you found the right arrangement here!

name: Salwa Jeries
text: Loved the peonies class, it was so much fun and super relaxing! Her works are beautiful and last forever!

resp.text: We're happy to know you found the workshop fun and relaxing, that is definitely our goal! Thank you for attending!

name: Sulav Darnal
text: Absolutely in love with The Paper Petals. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Sulav!!

name: The Stever’s
text: Wonderful flowers 💐 truly love them but the price point is high

resp.text: Thank you for your review and we're happy to hear you love our flowers!

name: Claire Young
text: We loved the flower workshop! An afternoon well spent. We'll definitely go again!!

resp.text: It was great having you attend our workshop and we look forward to seeing you again!

name: Martin Nguyen
text: Beautiful work!!! High quality people and products!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Martin!

name: Ellie Sikes
text:
Southerly is the BEST! I was lucky enough to work with them for my wedding this last year and it was such a joy. Sarah is so easy to work with and personable. The flowers themselves are gorgeous, and mixed with their creativity and unique style - Southerly Flower Farm is unmatched!!
As a team they really do have a way of taking the ideas that are in your head and making them come alive. Even in the midst of COVID and having to change our plans, numbers, and designs multiple times, she was steady, encouraging, and on top of everything. I came in with ideas of things I really wanted, and together we figured out a budget-friendly plan that worked perfectly for our special day. I can't recommend her enough!

name: Hailey Johnston
text: Absolutely loved my experience with Southerly Flower Farm!!! They were so wonderful to work with for our wedding - I asked them to surprise me for all of my wedding flowers, which is not the easiest task to do for a bride, and they rocked it! All of my flowers were gorgeous and very unique and very me, which means they are great listeners because I threw a lot of ideas at them. If you haven't had the chance to work with them you must!

name: Giselle Bird
text: They made all my bouquet dreams come true! They were easy to work with despite the pandemic, and I’m really impressed that after just 1 phone call they were able to make my vision come alive! Love how natural both my bouquet and the girls’ looked and felt. My hair flowers were beautiful and lasted all day and the boutonnières were perfect! Thank you so much Southerly Flower Farm! ❤️

name: flora ziliak
text: I’ve never left a google review before! But Southerly was so great to work with and I really recommend folks in the Chattanooga area to use them for floral services. They were so kind, helpful, and communicative in helping me get flowers together for our little pandemic elopement. Would definitely utilize their expertise again!

name: Neha Shah
text: Sarah and her team are amazing. They make the most beautiful arrangements and have the best customer service!! If you haven’t checked them out, you must.

name: Cayce Gearrin
text: I live up in MN and have used Southerly for many a Mother’s Day bouquet and birthday bouquets ...so when it came time to pick a florist for my wedding in TN, I knew exactly where I would go. Sarah was so great and coordinated the consultation with me when I was in town. We walked through what my vision was and she even did a site visit with mom to the wedding venue. She was awesome giving me a clear vision of what things work and what don’t and with very broad requests on my part ....as I do not know much about flowers and gave her basically a color scheme...she created a beautiful installation for our wedding ceremony and really brought the property to life with her arrangements scattered across the venue. I could not have been more happy with the service and quality of product that Southerly provides, Sarah is a true artist and this husband /wife team are amazing to work with!!!

name: Jaime Smialek - Our Ampersand Photo
text: By far the best wedding florist in Chattanooga!! Sarah's eye for design is unparalleled in this area. If you are design nerd, have an eye for florals, or believe in sustainable farming, these are your people. Their work is wild, whimsical, and simply stunning. Sarah and Matthew are a husband and wife team who grow their own flowers and build insane installations. They are a joy to work with. Great communicators, hard workers, and creative geniuses. I can not recommend them highly enough. You will not be disappointed.

name: Emily Mills
text: I have nothing but AMAZING things to say about Sarah and the team at Southerly Flower Farm.
