From the very beginning, Sarah was nothing but helpful and kind and understanding as I fumbled my way through having no specific idea of what I wanted for my flowers (apart from asking for them to be "woodsy" and contain thistles, BOTH of which she accomplished!). Sarah also was so quick to respond to questions and concerns I had; she answered all my questions about payment and financing honestly and openly; and she worked last minute to adjust and make changes when we downsized our wedding. She made the whole process simply so enjoyable and so smooth and I could not have asked for a better florist. Not to mention, the flowers were locally sourced which made me even happier! You will not be disappointed if you work with Southerly Flower Farm. I'd hire them again tomorrow!

name: Jennifer Holder
text:
Southerly Flower Farm made my wedding day PERFECT. She worked with my crazy color scheme to put together the most wonderful bouquets and centerpieces. She also added her creative eye to the overall decor and we are so lucky we had her do our wedding. Also, of course, she was super easy to work with. 100 PERCENT RECOMMEND!

(Photos by Taylor English Photography, who I'd also recommend!)

name: Vivian Lozano
text: I absolutely loved having Southerly Flower Farm do the flowers for our wedding. Sarah is wonderful to work with,  a great listener that can work with your ideas and take them to the next level. Honestly, I gave Sarah a hodgepodge of ideas that she managed to put together and she delivered beautifully, making everything look gorgeous. She was also really punctual, which I really appreciated. Would work with them again in a heartbeat and I recommend their services to everyone.

name: Maggie Ruch Frelinghuysen
text: 10/10 would recommend--I cannot praise Sarah's work enough! While we met early on to discuss my vision and preferences and touched base a few times during the planning process, I put my full trust in Sarah's creativity and allowed her to work her magic. The result was spectacular. I still look back at photos and gush over the flower arrangements and bouquets. She also was super helpful as I navigated my budget, and she had many ideas and options that kept me within my budget. Do yourself a favor and book Southerly Flower Farm for your wedding--you will not be disappointed!

name: Allie O'Connell
text: I loved working with Sarah having local flowers for my wedding last summer. I had a very low key wedding, and just ordered a bouquet and 2 DIY buckets of flowers that my friends and family help me arrange in stem vases. It was perfect and the flowers were stunning.

name: Marijke Griffin
text: Sarah was the best! I loved working with her, she was so so kind and helpful when figuring out what flowers I wanted for my bouquet and wedding. The flowers were beautiful, my bouquet was the prettiest I’ve ever seen! Perfect mix of whimsical and timeless. She also did an arch for us that looked beautiful and held up even in 98 degree weather throughout our wedding!  Book Sarah for all your event needs!

name: Skylar DeRight
text: Absolutely in love with Southerly Flower Farms. The flowers they styled (& grew) for my wedding were dreamy and beyond what I was anticipating. During our consultation, Sarah really took the time to get to know me and what I envisioned for our wedding. She was so easy to work with and helped our wedding day go smoothly. We received so many compliments from guests. Would love to be able to work with Southerly for future events.

name: Katie Schlabach
text: Sarah made all of my bridal bouquet dreams come true! My husband and I eloped on Lookout Mountain and wanted a “wildflower bouquet”. Nothing too polished.  Sarah obliged and it was even more beautiful than I imagined! I love keeping up with her on social media to see all the beautiful flowers she’s always growing and collecting. 😍

name: Mary Sawyer
text: Southerly Flower Farm made our wedding so special! I had a vision, but could never give Sarah any specifics and she was able to take my few little ideas and turn it into exactly the feel I imagined but SO much better than I could’ve dreamed up. It felt really special to have the flowers coming straight from their Chattanooga area farm, and I love that they use sustainable methods to create the arches and table settings. Just a great feel overall! She was willing to make anything work for my budget but also provided me with different levels of what she could do for each budget which was very helpful   . She and Matt arrived early to set everything up perfectly and they took care of taking everything down after, and made sure I didn’t have to worry about anything. I am still having people rave about the flowers at our wedding, and how unique and beautiful they were. I can’t say enough good things!

name: Grace Aki
text: Let me just say - I still think about my wedding flowers from 2018 to this day. Seriously Southerly Flower Farm was an immediate choice for our flowers. They were able to articulate my vision beyond what my wildest dreams. My fresh flowers were so unique the day of the wedding I cried when I held my bouquet, probably also due to the fact I was getting married. Regardless, SFF tied everything together and got everything to us in a timely fashion. The only florist I’ll ever recommend.

name: Leslie Garcia
text: For our wedding, I was set on finding a sustainable flower farm to work with. Sarah was the perfect person for this! She listened to my wedding ideas and came up with several options that would fit with my theme, ambitions and budget. Best investment and I would highly recommend!

name: Vance Olmstead
text: Another job well done! Best florist in town that always leaves me amazed with their end result!

resp.text: Out of all the great florists in town, Vance, we're flattered to see you think we're the best. There's nothing we love more than helping you out. If you ever need another beautiful arrangement, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Donny Harden
text: thank you to the staff @ Amy's..  We live out of town, I called late morning and placed the order for our daughters birthday. I got a text and picture from daughter at 1:20 of the flowers, she was so excited, in her words "BEAUTIFUL" ...Amy's helped make a daughter and teachers day... THANK YOU!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Donny!  It's our pleasure to make sure every customer is taken care of.

name: Bobby Hagler
text: I ordered flowers for my wife on our 40th anniversary at 4:30 pm on 5/28 to be delivered between 12:00 - 2:00 pm on 5/29. They send an email at 11:57 am on 5/29 cancelling the order. This is pathetic.

resp.text: We apologize for the miscommunication in your order, Bobby. Given the long weekend for Memorial Day, we were closed Saturday and Monday. We also had a technical issue that didn't reflect our correct hours online. We understand your frustration and we are sorry for the inconvenience. If you'd like to discuss this further offline, don't hesitate to give us a call. -Felisha, Owner

name: Camy Caruso
text: I just called there to order flowers for my daughter in law.  The lady who answered the phone was rude. She acted like it was an inconvenience.  I'm glad I didn't spend my money on the flowers there. And the 1 star was too much. Ordering somewhere else!

resp.text: Camy, I'm so disappointed to hear we've left you with such a poor impression. You should always expect to be treated like a friend when you work with us to create a beautiful arrangement, and I can assure you this was just a misunderstanding. I hope you'll consider giving us the chance to make things right. -Felisha, Owner

name: Neica Asher
text: I ordered flowers online and called with special delivery instructions. Amy's you went above and beyond with your customer service. Thanks for delivering beautiful flowers and being so friendly to the lady that received them. Excellent experience all around!

resp.text: There's nothing like getting to share smiles with our neighbors, Neica. It was our pleasure to deliver the beautiful arrangement for you. Please don't hesitate to give us a call if you ever need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: shirley smith
text: I used Google to find a place to deliver something, out of the ordinary, for a friend staying at a local hotel---and since it didn't require flowers I was at their mercy. The kind receptionist was able to help with everything in a matter of a few minutes... EXCEPTIONAL. Thank you!!

resp.text: Thanks for the support, Shirley! Glad to hear we were able to help out with your delivery. Let us know if you ever need anything else. -Felisha, Owner

name: Teddy Jackson
text: Great experience, Arrangement looked great! I will definitely use Amy's again.

resp.text: Teddy, I'm happy to hear that your order was everything you wanted. Our arrangements are some of the freshest in the area, so we're happy that you'll continue to support us. If you'd like anything specific, feel free to let us know next time. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jeri Moody
text: I called Amy's Florist from Georgia in hopes of ordering a plant for my son's girlfriend who just had surgery. Mark was a pleasure on the phone. He was very helpful in suggesting a plant, as well as tips on how to care for it. The delivery guy was also kind and delivered it promptly as well. I would definitely use Amy's again if I find myself needing another delivery in Tuscaloosa, AL. Thank you!!

resp.text:
Jeri, thanks for the stars! We're so glad to hear we were able to help you out. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else!
-Felisha, Owner

name: Larry Savino
text: I am in New York and needed a Great Easter basket for my Daughter who is in Tuscaloosa for college. I called in morning and the women I spoke with was very polite,Patent,and knowledgeable of her products. I described what I wanted she said NO PROBLEM, ask me for my budget and 3 hours latter my Daughter called and said she loved it. What more could you ask for from a vendor. Thank you to the staff at Amy's I appreciate the great service we received

resp.text: Larry, I know a year has gone by, but I just had to stop and thank you for these wonderful words! I'm happy we were able to help you make your daughter's day. I appreciate your support and hope you won't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: CATHY HOWELL
text: I went in to Amy’s to get a plant for a funeral and there was 3 different people helping us and we got 3 different prices.  So unorganized. Feel as tho they are ripping people off!!  Watch when you order!  NONE of the flowers had prices so we had to ask. We left and went to Stephanie’s where all the plants had prices you knew what you were paying for.

resp.text:
Cathy, we try to be upfront with our prices, so I'm sorry to hear you didn't leave with that impression. I appreciate your feedback, though, and I hope you'll give us another chance in the future. Take care.
-Felisha, Owner

name: Virginia Sanford
text: Always very helpful with choosing the right flower or plant. Also very helpful with last minute needs.

resp.text: Virginia, glad to hear you can always count on us! Thanks for the kind words, and we hope to see you again soon. -Felisha, Owner

name: Mona
text: I was sent some flowers by my boyfriends parents for Christmas. The whole arrangement fell apart when I got it, as they cut the stems so short they wouldn’t even stay in the container. It was mostly filler and the flowers died within 2 days. Highly disappointed.

resp.text: Mona, we're always happy to be a part of such sweet gestures. However, we searched our database history and don't see the transaction you're speaking about. I can assure you that our displays are well-made and always fresh. That's what sets our flowers above the rest. In the future, we're always happy to provide you with a quality arrangement at a moment's notice. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jennifer Stigall
text: Great experience using Amy's Florist! Very nice people to work with!  I definitely recommend using them, and they are LOCALLY Family owned!

resp.text: I know a couple of years have gone by, Jennifer, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this awesome review! Your recommendation means the world to me, and I'm so happy to read you had a great experience here. Please don't hesitate to reach out next time you need anything. -Felisha, Owner

name: Christian Parris
text: I had a wonderful experience on the phone ordering flowers for my girlfriend. Cynthia was very helpful and funny

resp.text: Thank you Christian!  We hope your girlfriend enjoys her flowers.

name: M P
text: Terrible Customer Service. In attempt to getting my girlfriend some Halloween themed flowers, Amy's Florist dropped the ball. I placed an order for one item and 5 minutes later they called and said they did not have the item or vase in stock YET I was still charged. After emailing and calling back, I was fully refunded. I decided to try my luck again and place another order but for a different item. Same thing, received a call saying it was not in stock. The people calling me were horribly unhelpful and rude and made it seem like I was to blame. Why have something on your website if it not in stock? I also find it suspicious Amy's Florist and Pat's Florist have the same exact webpage layouts besides color scheme. Trying my luck at a third floral shop and see if I finally can get something...

resp.text: Matthew, I am very sorry you had a bad experience with us. Yes you placed an order off our website that stated NO substitutions.  The closer it has gotten to Halloween we have sold out of most the containers. We would have been glad to do a similar arrangement for you but you said no substitutions. Also you did email us and I got back with you as soon as I seen the email, unfortunately I don't check my emails frequently.  The staff called and left you a message regarding the order, and soon as they spoke with you a refund was issued.  As for the two websites bringing the same...YES they are because a floral company designed them for us.  Nothing suspicious at all about that.  Again, I am very sorry we wasn't able to help you. It is not our goal to lose customers.

name: N Hinton
text: My Dad works here. The manager and staff are very cordial and my father ,one of the delivery guys, is extremely attentive and punctual in delivering the flowers. My Dad's a work-a-holic.

resp.text: I know several months have passed, but I didn't want to miss the chance to thank you for this wonderful review! We love having your dad on our team, and we appreciate your reaching out with an all-star rating. -Felisha, Owner

name: Ben Tuckerman
text: Friendly staff. Locally owned. Beautiful flowers. What's not to love!!

resp.text: Thank you, Ben! Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else. Take care. -Felisha, Owner

name: Jack Przebienda
text: Flowers were delivered and my girlfriend absolutely loved them. Great Value, would recommend

resp.text: We are so glad she loved them. Thank you for call Amy's Florist. We look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Andrea White
text:
Really rude people! Terrible customer service.  Called to get more information on their flower arrangements, unfortunately their website is limited on options so I went on their Facebook page and was able to find a lot more options for what I was looking for.  I had to literally described them the flowers I was looking at, and told them it would be easier for them to jump on their page with me .... nop! They started getting all mad and raised their voice over the phone because THEY DIDN'T KNOW how to even use Facebook.  The woman that was on the phone with me even started talking over me.  WILL NEVER buy anything from here and WILL NEVER recommend this place.
One star is even too much!

resp.text: Andrea, we want all of our guests to feel comfortable when talking to us, so I'm sorry to hear about your experience. It sounds like there was a miscommunication here, and I appreciate the feedback. If you do choose to do business with us again, we'll work hard to make it a better experience. -Felisha, Owner

name: Pat Stephenson
text: Nice folks, but somehow they lost the order, it was a funeral so you only get one shot at it.

resp.text: Pat I'm sorry to hear this.  I have researched our data base and I'm not showing where an order was placed in your name.  I surely hope if the order was placed with us, that we took care of you to make sure you where completely satisfied.

name: Holly Holman
text: Extremely disappointed in Amy's.  I just sent my mother a birthday bouquet via Teleflora and paid extra for the Premium bouquet which featured a larger arrangement with more flowers (6 large roses and 6 smaller roses).  My mother just texted a picture of the flowers to say thank you and there are 2 roses and a bunch of filler flowers.  I'm in Kansas City, but believe if I were at home, I would be making my way to have a serious talk with Amy or whoever stole my money.  I could've gotten more money's worth out of a Publix bouquet.  I'm seriously angry.  This was NOT a $95 arrangement.

resp.text:
Hello Holly,
I'm so sorry you were disappointed in the arrangement. It's not our goal to make customers unhappy.  In this situation going through a 3rd party to place an order is not always the best thing to do. You mention you spent $95 on the arrangement but that's not what the sender gave us to work with. Also, out of the total, we had to take out for the 2 balloons and delivery charge that was associated with the order.  Yes, you could have got more flowers from Publix, but I don't sell Publix quality flowers. I only carry the freshest and finest. I agree the arrangement doesn't look like the picture you picked out and I'm more than happy to correct our mistake.  We want every customer to be completely satisfied ...that's our goal. We gain nothing from an unhappy customer!

name: Brian Patterson
text: I certainly wouldn't buy from a place that hangs up on its callers, as a vendor.... very unprofessional

resp.text: Not sure why you would make a statement as such!  My staff and I are very friendly to every caller unless you are a telemarketer.  We all know how annoying that can be.

name: Tara Campbell
text: Not so nice.  The person I ordered from had an attitude the entire time I was on the phone.  UA discount or not, I do not recommend.

name: Dale Dowdle
text: ALWAYS a Great Experience

resp.text: Dale, thanks so much for stopping in! Hope to see you here again, as always! -Felisha, Owner

name: Patti Jackson
text: Love ordering from the local florist.  The owner made the arrangement we purchased for our best friend Mom's home going..  I had some concerns at first look but she went over & above to make it beautiful for the family of Mrs Katie Simmons .   Thank you!!

name: Heather Richardson
text: The owner is absolutely amazing! Has went above and beyond for me on many occasions! Makes sure my mom whom has cancer gets occasional fresh flowers and also set up a fundraiser for her where a certain percentage of rose purchases on Valentine’s Day went to my moms medical expenses! Paige has the absolute best customer service! Once you meet her she will seem like family and definitely treat you like it!  Life is about those moments when someone you cross paths with make huge impacts, she is definitely one of those people!

name: Bethany Small
text: This shop is beyond amazing, the quality of design is cutting edge. The Prices are reasonable, our Wedding Flowers were everything we wanted plus so much more. However the most notable gift you will receive is just a beautiful person who will go out of her way to make you happy. Our family loves you Ms Paige and you will always have a special place in our hearts!

name: Neal Smith
text: Paige does amazing work. She will tailor everything to your specific taste. She goes above and beyond to be sure every customer is completely satisfied. I would recommend Sunflowers to anyone and I have to many!

name: Elliott Mattisen
text: Mrs.Paige is the sweetest and kindest person you will ever meet and her work is over the top great and beautiful and I will never get flowers from anyone other than her.

name: Florence Handyman
text: Paige is what I would have to say.. THE BEST florist I have ever worked with.. I have customers and contacts local AND out of state.. No matter what the situation is.. She makes something custom & beautiful at a fair price OR works a deal on our behalf even as far as california.. She has handled funerals, birthdays, customer appreciation etc for us and we have NEVER been disappointed.. I 100% recommend her & Sunflowers Designs!

name: Kristi Sibert
text: They went above and beyond for my daughter in law’s birthday arrangement that I ordered! We had discussed hydrangeas, and when they were not available, another beautiful arrangement was sent...and then when the hydrangeas can in, they OUTDID themselves and sent a second arrangement! How is that for customer service!!! Thank you! I’ll be calling them again!

name: Alisha Sowell
text: Very rude and standard!

name: Matthew Conde
text: TOP NOTCH FLORIST! Bella Blooms is always on the spot with providing excellent, quick service with a reasonable price! They are very creative when it comes to their floral designs (not just flowers in a vase). Highly recommend!

name: Peyton Gans Booth
text: I just got married on Halloween and I was shocked by the magic Jason & Michelle worked for me!! Honestly the most beautiful floral arrangements I'd ever seen. I received so many compliments. Jason is SO easy to talk to and listened to all of my requests. HIGHLY recommend!!

name: rick merriam
text: This is the real deal florist. They have the best service and the best flower arrangement my wife has ever seen. I used to go to Homewood to get her flowers but not any more. This place is worth the drive

name: Amy B
text: Beautiful flowers and very kind staff. Highly recommend!

name: carla irwin
text: Desiree and Kat were so amazing to us and the flowers were beyond amazing.  They were a true part of our wedding in every sense and I will miss talking with them.  I feel like we found not only a brilliant florist, but we found friends.  They took our vision and made it a reality.

name: Mary Hales-Ward
text: Being unable to attend a family funeral, I wanted to send something heartfelt and beautiful.  They did not disappoint.  The spray was outstanding and beautiful.  They completed it and delivered it in a timely manner and my expectations were exceeded.  I am so thankful I found them.

name: gabrielle byrd
text: Incredibly talented and incredibly helpful! I loved my flower arrangements and it was such a quick and easy process!

name: Janis Laws
text: I live in NC and my sweet daughter-in-law lost her grandmother.  I had no idea what florist to contact, but I was very impressed with this website.  The gentleman answering the phone was extremely nice and helpful, and even offered to deliver the plant to her home when he got off work at 5:00.  I am very glad I chose this place.  He did exactly what he said he would do and my daughter-in-law said the plant was beautiful.  Thank you for the great customer service, Bella Blooms and Designs.

name: Shelley Carrigan
text: I ordered a basket and was a given a janky wood box with stems as the handles. The flowers were not vibrant and colorful, but they were dark and dull. On top of being unhappy with the flowers- Rodd Sinclair made it worse. His attitude is going to ruin this business. I'll order from Alabaster florist next time...I dont think they would hang up on me.... lets not forget to mention that they deleted my yelp review.

name: Mark Stephenson
text: Great job especially for a last minute call! She loved them

name: Patrick Lee
text: Stopped in to get flowers sent to my wife on Valentine's Day. They were delightful to deal with, and the flowers looked amazing. Would absolutely recommend them to anyone in the area.

name: Lori Daza
text:
AMAZING customer service. Very easy to work with, friendly, courteous, knowledgeable... I can go on and on about how amazing they are but everyone should go find out more by choosing this place for your floral/gift needs! You will not be disappointed.
Rod went above and beyond for me when I called to make an order. I've honestly never had a better experience with a company. He was extremely accommodating and very very helpful; not to mention the flowers I ordered looked absolutely beautiful!
The quality of my bouquet was more than I expected.
Will definitely come back!

name: tesla nichole
text: I used Pelham Flowers for the first time today to send Mother's Day flowers. They were very helpful when I called and worked with my budget. The arrangement they put together and sent was beautiful!! It was so much better than I had even expected. I will definitely used Pelham Flowers again. I recommend you try them, also!

name: Ellen Fleisher
text: Excellent!!! My husband and I used Pelham Flowers by Desiree for all our wedding and rehearsal flowers. We LOVED her work. She helped us create the perfect look we were hoping for at great price.She offered creative suggestions and was extremely professional.  I have used Pelham Flowers for several events and bought flowers from her for friends and family. Desiree is creative and wonderful to work with. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for an awesome florist!

name: Henry Collins
text: The best place to get flowers. They are known for their modern and funky flower designs. I got flowers for my girlfriend from Pelham Flowers By Desiree last year for Valentines and it was absolutely gorgeous. Their products are by far the best priced among the flower shops in Birmingham area. The best thing I like about them are they use flowers from local growers around Jefferson and Shelby county. When you buy flowers from them you are actually contributing to the local economy. How cool is that? I ordered my flowers from them again this year to be delivered to my girlfriends work. I am excited to see their creation.

name: Mo Pop
text: Desiree did my wedding flowers and they were so beautiful! I couldn't have asked for better! The colors were perfect and they were so unique! Love this florist and will definitely use them again!

name: Jennifer Jacobs
text: I cannot recommend Flowers By Desiree enough. I am in Charleston, SC and I was trying to arrange a flower delivery for a family member who needed a bright spot in her day. The staff members were so helpful and explained what flowers they had available and delivered them to her just a few hours later. The descriptions did not do the flowers justice they were just beautiful!!! Thank you so much Flowers By Desiree!!!!!

name: Melissa Lesueur
text:
Pelham  Flowers by Desiree  and her staff are very nice, and their work is Amazing! I contacted Desiree to do a blanket of silk flowers for my Mother's funeral. My Brother's and I  met the with Desiree and gave her our Idea of what we wanted and the budget. Once we saw the flowers we were blown away of how amazing the flowers looked so real. This lady is very talented, and  you can tell that she absolutely loves what she does. Desiree went above and beyond our expectations!
We will not use any one else!

name: Pam Chut
text: My husband recently surprised me with a bouquet from Pelham Flowers by Desiree.  Beautiful flowers and super fresh.  Love them!  Still fresh as new five days later.

name: Cliff Chappell
text: I ordered flowers for a funeral, and they were very helpful in offering suggestions over the phone. The flowers were awesome.  I will definitely order from there again.  I highly recommend them and will recommend them to anyone I know needing flowers.  Thanks for the great service and product.

name: Jason Moore
text: Best place in Birmingham to get your flowers! Unique floral designs and great service! I highly recommend this florist to all my friends!

name: joseph sowder
text: Great florist. Have used for more than 1 wedding venue. Would use again.

name: Dr Kelsey Graham
text: A couple of our neighbors graciously sent a plant to my wife who has a lengthy hospital stay.  I give the low rating here for two reasons- 1. A professional would have first checked with the hospital to ensure that plants or flowers were allowed. In my wife's case NONE are allowed on the entire floor where she is being kept. The plant was simply left at the nurses station and the staff of Pelham Flowers simply skipped away happily counting their dollars regardless of whether the intended party could ever enjoy the purchase or not. 2. The card that was placed on the plant is an over the top advertisement for Pelham Flowers. It is nothing more than a business brochure with a small print line indicating who the intended benefactor of the plant is.  Welcome to Amerika home of the god $$$$$ humans be damned! Money rules in spite of delivery or not. And please let us over promote ourselves in hospitals all around town by using the greeting card as nothing more than a advertisement!!!! Yeah!!!! No thanks. Totally inconsiderate and thoughtless taking of money- pure greed Amerikan style.

name: Karla Watson
text: I love the friendly employees and their smalltown ideals! They are willing to go above and beyond to please their customers. Most of all, the flowers are GORGEOUS!! They can arrange them in any style you like...just ask them!! :)

name: Alan Thomas
text: The arrangement was wonderful, delivery timing was perfect, and everything had such a personal and caring touch.  Desiree really put together something wonderful, and I wish I could post a picture of the gorgeous arrangement she created for me.  The wife loved it, and her coworkers were jealous.  I'm sure next time they get flowers sent to them, they will tell their boyfriends and husbands to call Desiree.

name: Miles Akins
text: From the groom's perspective - we were on a budget for our wedding.  We met with 3 other florists before Desiree, and they all said they had ideas to keep us in budget, but their quotes said otherwise.  Then we contacted Desiree, and she really did have great budget-minded ideas that kept my checkbook happy.  I picked up the flowers myself the day of the wedding (to save some more cash). They were packed and ready to go when I arrived, and I was back on the road in no time.  Most importantly, my stressing bride instantly calmed down when she saw how beautiful the flowers turned out.  The flowers looked great in bouquets, on the tables and chairs, and on the cake.  My wife dried some of her bouquet and we placed them in frames on the wall.  I would definetely purchase flowers again from Desiree in a heartbeat.  Highly recommended.

name: Debbie Atchley
text: We chose Flowers by Desiree after receiving one of their arrangements.  They were so helpful and the arrangement we ordered was beautiful.  Their shop is filled with goodies too!

name: Bridgette Pertile
text: My flowers were beautiful and the service was outstanding and very personable!!!  My daughter loved them!  I will definitely be using them for all my future flower needs.

name: Lloyd Winger
text: Unfortunately  I received my bouquet during the recent severe cold spell.  My beautiful arrangement was damaged by the low temp.  Greg from Pelham Flowers by Desiree said they wanted to work with me and make it right.  I greatly appreciate how they handled my situation.  A replacement floral bouquet was offered along with a refund to the sender.  Because of this attitude I will not only return to this business but highly recommend them.  Thank you! P. Winger

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Beautiful work! Will be using Desiree for all my floral needs

name: Jan Davis
text: Real cute place, very hard workers.

name: Ryan Harmon
text: Google hours are wrong. They were closed when I arrived. Hours on weekdays are until 4pm

name: DeAnne Daniels
text: Beautiful arrangement.

name: Will Hallman
text: Incredible work! My daughter is sick and flowers are her favorite. I believe these brightened her day. Thank you Joy's Flowers!

name: Jamie Moon
text: I ordered a premium floral arrangement for a funeral.  The basket was delivered on time to the viewing, which is more than I can say for some companies. However, it was not as pictured and it was the most pitiful, smallest, arrangement received that day. An $80 basket should not be an embarrassment.

name: Corey McIntyre
text: Flowers I ordered and had sent turned out beautiful..I did the custom pick and let the specialist work there magic ..excellent job and service ..highly recommend

name: Chris H
text: Cool shop with more than just flowers. They were a great help and put together a nice bouquet last minute.

name: Audra Williams
text: I ordered and paid for the premium 68 dollar basket..to say when I saw this arrangement that I was sorely disappointed and felt taken advantage of for the amount I paid is an understatement! I live out of state, so I guess the florist thought that I wouldn't see the end product.... I will never recommend or use this florist again! I could have purchased a basket in my home town and delivered it myself for less than I paid for this arrangement.

name: Emily Crumpler
text: I order a few baskets at once for different people.  One basket got put at the house behind theirs (there are two houses on their lot). This business offered and took another one out right away, they fix the situation and did not act like it was a problem at all. I would order from them in a heartbeat.  I personally also thought the prices were reasonable.

name: Jn F. Turner
text: I received roses for Valentines day from my husband he was very disappointed at the arrangement looked really cheap and nothing like the picture arrangement he saw online.  You could barely see the roses. I was very disappointed as well after learning what he spent for it. He is still apologizing for it.

name: Senior HelpersNEO
text: I ordered an arrangement from Joy's for the first time a few days ago, and my experience was amazing. The hydrangeas were beautiful and the staff was very helpful. They were able to fulfill my order in a few short hours (for a great price). I highly recommend Joy's, they take great care of their customers, and their flowers are of great quality! You will not be disappointed. Five stars

name: Courtney Moon
text: Ordered an arrangement online for a funeral. Extremely disappointed and shocked when I actually saw the arrangement. Much much smaller in person.  Absolutely wasn't worth the price paid. Would not recommend ordering online. Will not be ordering again.

name: Robert Owens
text: Ok.   Not the warmest reception.   Will try somewhere else next time.

name: Craig Bowman
text: Wonderful experience there

name: Lanicsha W
text: Overall the service from this business was exceptional, I was pleased with both the delivery and the quality of the floral arrangement. I would definitely recommend this business to everyone.

name: Kristen Frost
text: Joy's did my wedding and they did an AMAZING job!! They are my go-to florist for everything! They do such wonderful work and are always so kind! I give them all the stars and will continue to use them and refer them to friends!!

name: Casey Riddlesperger
text: Wonderful people. Great customer service. GORGEOUS flowers. Called with a last minute order needed for the next morning. Beyond impressed with the results. The arrangement was perfect!  Will definitely order from Joy’s again.

name: Kayla Rose
text: Beautiful arrangement. Great price. Fast friendly delivery.

name: Viv Pace
text: Very poor customer service skills taking order by phone giving cryptic answers as if uninterested. It's easier to simply go elsewhere.

resp.text: I am so sorry to hear this. We will take note of this and make sure to do a better job. I am truly sorry that you were not happy with your experience. If there is anything we can do to make it better, please feel free to call 256-546-6381 and ask for Kristen.

name: Shanell Taylor
text: My experience with Joy's Flowers was outstanding! The ordering process was simple. They arrived very quickly. And the flowers were amazing! My mother loved them. I highly recommend ordering from them!

name: Dawn Frost
text: Nice atmosphere for a floral shop great decor with all kinds of items to decorate your home with. From hand painted vases to a refinished dresser for sale. Lady who worked there was very and helpful. She helped me decide on a bouquet for a friends birthday. Will be back to order more flowers for this Valetines Day!

name: C. Bos
text: We count on Joy's flowers to keep beautiful arrangements on Mom's table for every special day. They accommodate special requests as best they can with the flowers they have. Our mom loves pink. :)

name: Crystal Grochola
text: This is a wonderful flower shop and gift shop. Such wonderful people who work there and overall great prices. I will be using them again. Love Joy's .....

name: Jessie Miller
text: My corsage for prom was horrible put together the rose fell off 30 mins of wearing it (thank god I had done senior lead out already) and the baby breath flow had out even bloomed yet and we paid 36.00$ so I give you  a 1

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that. We will be in touch with you soon in hopes that we can do something to make this better. Is there a name other than Jessie Miller that your order would be under?

name: Jay P
text: This is at least the 4th year I have ordered from Joy's and my sister loves the arrangements and baskets I send her from here.  This time I spoke with Tiffany and she was bright, pleasant and knowledgeable.  We were able for me to visualize a similar arrangement online  My former wife's family was in the flower business here in South Florida for decades and I appreciate good service and great arrangements and Joy's does it extremely well.

name: Jc Chandler
text: Love this shop. I walk in and they know exactly what I want and my name. Recommend highly. They rap the roses anyway I ask.

name: Kathryn Ballard
text: Excellent service, reasonable prices, and high quality in the snack basket that I ordered. I would highly recommend Joy's...

name: Gene Walker
text: I ordered funeral arrangement and it was not delivered even after being told it had been when I checked the morning of service. Then they were suppose to have a plant delivered to the home of the mother of deceased and has been 2 days and still no plant. I live out of state and called the florist (Joys) myself. Will not use nor recommend them ever again.

name: Laura Singleton
text: VERY EASY TO ORDER ONLINE AND WAS VERY IMPRESSED TO GET AN EMAIL ADVISING ONCE ORDER HAD BEEN DELIVERED

name: Kelsey Todd

name: Johnny Carcioppolo
text: I learned a long time ago to trust the EXPERTS when it comes to having something done right. Jerry at Bishop's Flowers is the Expert when it comes to anything related to flowers and plants. When you need anything from a corsage to planning the arrangements for a wedding you really need to go to Bishops Flowers and talk to Jerry. His years of experience in the industry is evident in everything he creates. He has a keen way of listening to what you want and delivering something that is so much better than you could have hoped for. Maybe you are looking for something unique and special for Valentines Day, or you are planning a wedding and have a vision of what the bouquet will look like and what arrangements you want for the ceremony. Don't trust just anyone to make that vision a reality, trust the Experts. Jerry will listen and take your ideas and deliver something that will blow you away. How about service after the sale. Bring your bouquet back to Jerry and let him heirloom it for you and turn it into something you will have forever to remember that special day. Bishop's is not your ordinary florist, they don't just sell you something and move on to the next client. Jerry will also educate you on the best way to care for your new creation so it lasts longer than you would ever think possible. He will make sure you know what your flower arrangement needs to stay as beautiful as it is when you pick it up for the longest amount of time. He will make sure you know exactly how to care for the plant you bought so it will thrive. So no matter what your needs are in flowers or plants make sure you give Bishops Flowers a chance to impress you and you will never go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you for your review...so nice of you!

name: J.M. Froman
text:
I thought people in the South were supposed to be friendly. I walked into this shop looking for some flowers and hoping for a delivery. I even offered to pay more than asking price for a delivery. The delivery really wasn't so much of a concern as it was getting an arrangement that I was happy with and would be meaningful for the person that I was sending them to.

From the moment I walked in I was made very aware that they were about to close. Since I knew the flowers I wanted and they had them that made quick work of that portion. Being that I'm not a florist and I am a male I don't know all the things that make up a floral design, but I do know what looks pretty.  I was asked if I had a budget,  To which I replied not necessarily I just want something that looks pretty. The owner said how about a $100.00 and I said OK fine.

While he was putting together the arrangement I asked if perhaps they gave any discounts to military service members to which he replied no. I continued to ask if they gave discounts to various other organizations that I belong to such as the Chamber of Commerce and others to which he replied in emphatically "NO". Now, at this point I was really just trying to make friendly conversation so I made a couple of friendly jokes about not having discounts, on which he became irate and said he was about to refund me my money and take back the arrangement.

I just find it appalling that people can be so rude and have no sense of friendliness or humor whatsoever, especially in the time and day we live in where businesses are hurting to make money and I'm spending my hard earned money there.

He even went so far as to ask if I gave discounts in my business. I told him that in fact yes I do, all of the time. I wasn't really looking for a whole lot, 10% or something close to match an online competitors price which happened to be about $20 less. I don't know why it was unreasonable to ask for a small discount to show a little appreciation to any local organizations I belong to, much less for service to this country. I was appalled by his short and rude tone, especially after he told me he was the head of North Alabama BNI. You would think someone in this position would know how to run a business with not only some poise but also some friendly customer service. As long as I am a resident here I will never spend another dollar in this establishment and I'm not telling anyone not to do so, but I will say that if you spend money there, no appreciation is given for it and I might encourage you to find some other businesses that may appreciate it a little bit more.

They also recently accommodated a last minute arrangement for a funeral. It was beautiful despite me calling them the evening before.

Hands down the best florist in Huntsville.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Amanda Champion
text: Bishop's partners, Leigh and Jerry, are a great choice for someone who doesn't have opinions about what they want. The experience with Bishops started out ideal, but the more involved my vision became the less comfortable I felt with the florist. Just over thirty days out I received the itemized breakdown where the wrong color roses were ordered. A week prior Leigh suggested changing the color which I agreed to, but then the previous color was ordered. My husband spoke to them about it and Jerry was not the most friendly. My husband was told that their mistake almost cost us $500 and that he should tell me to stay off Pinterest. Then on our wedding day everything was set up promptly. The free tossing bouquet I should have received for signing a contract within two weeks of the initial consultation was not delivered. Luckily one of my bridesmaids couldn't take hers with her to Colorado. The vision came together mostly in the end. The flowers were gorgeous. I was satisfied with most of the arrangements, but the collaborative process was stressful. Mostly because the communication between the partners is lacking.

name: silent h
text: Every time I get flowers for my girlfriend these guys take such good care of me. I brought in a vase I made my girlfriend for valentines days and they picked out everything for me, making a custom combination to fit and match my vase. Every one there is so nice. Would recommend to anyone. So much better they grocery store bouquets!

When it arrived they let me know by calling which was super convenient. Since it was just a simple thing I wasn't expecting it to be fancy or anything, but they took the time to wrap it and make it look nice even though they didn't have to. text: The shea creme is absolutely amazing.  Do you  have a retail store at 1818 Farms?  I would love to come there and buy some more. If not, is there a location in Nashville that sells your products?

name: Tanya Hill
text: I knew nothing of this company until I’d received a gift for Teacher’s Appreciation week purchased from 1818 Farms. I was sold immediately on their product! I’ve since ordered from them several times. I buy their whipped shea butter mostly - it’s creamy without being greasy and a little goes a long way! I’ve also purchased their products for gifts - needless to say, my mom and grandmother are now hooked! While this review/comment is based on my experiences with this company on a whole, my most recent experience, specifically, is what encouraged me to form a review for the public. I recently placed an order for two of their gift boxes and a couple of single items. The order contained Mother’s Day gifts for my mom and grandmother. The order was received, processed and delivered PROMPTLY - like within two business days (I didn’t pay extra for expedited shipping). I received a text alert when the product was delivered - around noon, yday. It was quite warm outside and I still had hours before I’d get home from work. I was a bit worried about the product sitting in the heat/sun. As soon as I got home, I unpacked the box. The way it was packed so carefully and with consideration was a plus, BUT I also noticed that there was a Koolit refrigerant pack placed in the bottom of my carefully packed order...packed in anticipation of a warm day and no one being home to receive the package once it arrived. This may seem like a small thing. This may seem like “common” sense and good business practices, but as someone who does a LOT of online shopping, I can assure you that many businesses don’t put even a fraction of thought and consideration into packing their product for delivery. 1818 Farms has a lifetime customer!

text: Well i like going to places to shop where I'm familiar with the people truly if I'm going to need some professional help and that's why i tracked this place down and got over there as fast as i could because i knew that they could help me in the situation that i was in, my back was up against the wall, my hands was sweating, my heart was aching, i was nervous, i was scared, i had to do something and i had to do something fast and i knew that Brad and his wife could help me along with the help of God! I had messed up and dropped the ball with and high profile client and friend and i had to do something oh i had to do something today! The first thing that i did was pray and cry but after talking to older gentleman they said look! Do this but don't let it happen again and i would tell you exactly what happened but really and truly this world is just too small and the minds of people are very curious and they never rest and hardly sleep and without this place and the people in it i would've lost this rose for forever when it happened it truly hurt my heart i felt as if my heart had dropped during the process of me standing on the edge of a cliff and i truly had to be as humanly creative as i possibly could I'd rather go far too much further over to save a relationship with a client and close friend than far too far under and completely loose her all together and im still not telling you who they are or exactly what happened or where there from because this world is too small and the state of Alabama is even smaller either I'm not telling people are way far much more smarter than what most people realize how did this happen i have no idea but with everything in me I'm going to fix this i promise.

resp.text: We were so happy to help!

name: Shealynn Seaman
text: 2nd time we have had our beautiful flowers come in a gorgeous but leaky vase. Almost ruined our end table two times now. Never had the need to check a vase for leaks from any other florist but have had two vases that seeped small amounts of water from the bottom. The first time we overlooked and thought that’s odd but sometimes things like this happen. The 2nd time has caused us to no longer give Homewood florist our business. I thought my flowers were beautiful - and they were but my husband said he requested roses, daisies and many other flowers in pastel colors. The arrangement that was delivered had only star gazer lilies, white hydrangeas and lots and lots of greenery. Not the custom order he had placed.

resp.text:
Hi Shealynn! I am so sorry about the vases leaking! Can you describe what they looked like, so we can check them? I do wish you had let us know the first time it happened, because it definitely sounds like a defect!
If you can give me a call at 205.413.6965, that would be great!
Thanks!
Marilee

name: Virginia Porter
text: Bradley has been my florist for years and I have never been disappointed. Beautiful arrangements, always fresh. He is such an awesome designer. Turn him loose and let him design a unique arrangement for you. He can do cookie cutter stuff, but who wants that when you can get something unusual and amazing!

name: Travis Rainbolt
text: This shop is very unique. Offering Antiques, Specialty Gifts, AND a wide selection of fresh flowers... you won't find another business like it. The staff is friendly, and knowledgeable, and have always provided excellent customer service when I speak to them. I highly recommenced them for any gift or floral needs.

name: Matt Waters
text: Very beautiful arrangement for my soon-to-be wife. Working with Bradley was great and I couldn't be happier!

resp.text: Bradley is the best!

name: Marilee Howard
text: To put it simply, this flower shop has the most beautiful and unique arrangements I have ever seen. I would give it 10 stars if I could.

name: Caitlyn Smith
text: I just had major surgery, and my mother had a stroke so one of our dear friends sent us a large, beautiful bouquet. The flowers themselves are so beautiful. If I was rating on flowers alone I would give them 5 stars! However, the lady who delivered my flowers was absolutely mean. As she was handing me the flowers, my elderly dog ran out the door. She starts sniffing the lady's leg and wagging her tail. The lady starts to walk away and my dog followed her. She said "You better come get your dog!" Well, I just had major surgery and can't get down the stairs of my front porch. She then says "If you don't come get your dog, I will kick it!!!" My dog is 18 years old and doesn't have an aggressive bone in her body. My dog then walked over to the grass, away from the lady to do her business. I told the lady "Merry Christmas" to which she she said "uh huh" and walked back to her car. So rude. If you're considering having flowers delivered to someone's door, and they have a dog, DO NOT USE HOMEWOOD FLOWERS.

resp.text:
Caitlyn. I am so sorry you had such a horrific experience with the last owner of Homewoood Flowers. I am Bradley Gilbert. I bought Homewoood Flowers January 2018 and have since moved the shop to Vestavia Hills and Changed the name to Flower Betty.
I would like to offer you a replacement floral arrangement and get a chance to meet you. (Which is what the previous owner SHOULD have done). Please call me at your convenience. 205-694-9229.
I am so sorry you were treated badly, as well as your sweet pup.

name: Sean Mantler
text: Absolutely beautiful Christmas decorations and displays! Very friendly and attentive staff.

name: Elliott Varner
text:
So.... I was told by the owner of Tiger Lilly that he did his job and those flowers and exactly what I ordered. He then went on to tell me he went above and beyond by upgrading the vase and adding a bow. He then tells me that it isn't fair to him for me to bash him on social media. The post is on tiger Lilly's Facebook page under community comments. I am yet to see where I bashed him. Then he continues to inform me how you just cant make some people happy. Not one time did he offer any reparations, exchanges, refunds, discounts, or even an apology. So that's my experience with Slade Carden and Tiger Lilly.
When I pointed out that he had not apologized he offered a half hearted apology. I cancelled my other orders and will not do business here again.

name: Kyle Cochran
text: Tiger lily is the best  in town! They always exceed my expections! Make sure to call them for all your flower needs!
